Sip on zesty pisco sours and indulge in dishes like ceviche and South American grilled platters while enjoying the sleek design inspired by Central Park. This fashionable venue offers a unique atmosphere with neon lights and even a bathroom boasting cityscape views.

name: Anju Korean Rooftop Bar
summary: Bangkok's first Korean rooftop bar, Anju offers breathtaking panoramic views from the 31st floor of the Sindhorn Midtown Hotel. K-pop music sets a lively atmosphere while guests enjoy comfort foods like cheese tteobokki and shrimp ramyun. Unique cocktails crafted with Korean spirits complement the experience perfectly, making it a must-visit for food and drink enthusiasts.

name: Seen Restaurant and Bar
summary: Seen Restaurant and Bar offers a stunning rooftop experience with breathtaking 360-degree views of Bangkok. While the bar may not boast top-tier mixologists, its vibrant atmosphere and popularity speak volumes. Perfect for those seeking an unforgettable night out in the city.

name: ABar Rooftop
summary: ABar Rooftop stands out in Bangkok's nightlife, consistently topping the BAD Awards for rooftop bars. The venue has recently introduced 'Nights at the Yard', a series of vibrant weekly parties that cater to diverse crowds. With excellent food and drink offerings, it promises an unforgettable experience under the stars.

name: Aesop’s
summary: Aesop’s has relocated to a stunning rooftop space in Thonglor, offering vibrant Greek cuisine with a view of Benjakitti Park. The interior design features high ceilings, marble accents, and classical Greek elements for an immersive dining experience. This venue combines culinary delights with a chic atmosphere, making it a must-visit.

name: Aire Bar
summary: Aire Bar offers a relaxed rooftop atmosphere with stunning views of Benjasiri Park, perfect for unwinding after a long day. Signature cocktails are crafted to delight, making it an ideal spot for casual gatherings. Open daily from 3 PM to 1 AM, this bar is a hidden gem in the heart of Bangkok.

name: AmBar
summary: AmBar is the go-to spot on Sukhumvit Soi 11, renowned for its vibrant bachata events every Sunday. The lively atmosphere attracts both locals and visitors looking to dance the night away. Enjoy a night filled with rhythm, energy, and great company at this popular venue.

name: Bangkok Heightz
summary: Bangkok Heightz offers a refreshing escape with its lush surroundings and low-rise building views. The bar's glass wall enhances the connection to nature, creating an inviting atmosphere for sports enthusiasts. Enjoy tasty cocktails in this easy-going environment, perfect for unwinding after a long day.

name: Brewski
summary: Brewski offers a refreshing escape with its lush greenery and low-rise building views. The glass walls create a seamless connection to nature, enhancing the laid-back atmosphere of this sports bar. Open daily from 5 PM to midnight, it's the perfect spot for enjoying tasty drinks in a chill setting.

name: Cactus
summary: Cactus beer bar exudes a laid-back party vibe, perfect for unwinding with friends. An impressive range of international beers, from American crafts to Belgian classics, pairs well with Thai-style snacks like sai krok Isaan. Don't miss the refreshing Zeffer Crisp Green Apple Cider from New Zealand for a unique twist.

name: Char
summary: A rooftop gem at Hotel Indigo, Char offers a stylish dining experience alongside breathtaking views of Bangkok's greenery. The grill specializes in premium beef sourced from Australia's Darling Downs, promising a top-notch culinary adventure. Open daily from 5 PM to 1 AM, it's perfect for evening relaxation or socializing under the stars.

name: Cielo Sky Bar & Restaurant
summary: Cielo Sky Bar & Restaurant offers a vibrant blend of tapas and tiki vibes atop EmQuartier, featuring tropical decor and Instagram-worthy spots. This downtown beach club ambiance invites guests to unwind in style while enjoying sunset views. Open daily from 5 PM to 1 AM, it's the perfect spot for evening relaxation or socializing with friends.

name: Cocoa XO
summary: Cocoa XO offers a unique experience with an all-you-can-eat chocolate buffet paired with fine cognac. Nestled between two other rooftop bars, it provides a delightful opportunity to enjoy breathtaking views and a refreshing breeze. The circular seating arrangement ensures that every patron can savor the ambiance from any spot.

name: Cooling Tower
summary: Located on the rooftop of Carlton Hotel, Cooling Tower offers a serene escape from the bustling Asoke intersection below. Enjoy their celebrated happy hour featuring buy-one-get-one deals on a diverse selection of cocktails, wine, and beer. With stunning views and a lengthy drink menu, this venue is perfect for unwinding after a long day.

name: Cru Champagne
summary: Cru Champagne offers an extraordinary experience atop the Centara Grand at CentralWorld, featuring a stunning 360-degree view of Bangkok from the 59th floor. Accessed via a private elevator, this bar specializes in Champagne, making it an ideal spot for celebrations. Savor the elegance of G.H. Mumm Cordon Rouge Brut while soaking in the vibrant cityscape.

name: Escape
summary: Escape offers a vibrant fusion of a tapas and tiki bar, perfectly embodying its 'downtown beach club' theme. The venue is adorned with tropical plants and playful flamingo decor, creating an Instagram-worthy atmosphere. Open daily from 5pm to 1am, it's an ideal spot for evening relaxation and socializing.

name: Flamenco
summary: Flamenco stands out as a vibrant sky bar that captures the essence of nightlife with its Latin-themed decor and dynamic DJ sets. While the atmosphere leans towards the high-society crowd, the focus remains firmly on delivering an unforgettable party experience. Enjoy stunning views while dancing to electrifying beats in this sought-after venue.

name: Frankie’s Rooftop
summary: Frankie’s Rooftop is an intimate venue known for its vibrant house music and lively parties. The European cuisine provides the perfect fuel for a night of dancing under the stars. Despite its small size, the energy and atmosphere make it a must-visit spot in Bangkok's nightlife scene.

name: Invitation Only
summary: Sky-high views await at Invitation Only, perched on the 55th floor of Empire Tower. This bar offers nostalgic cocktails crafted from homemade ingredients and a serious food menu featuring dishes like piri piri chicken skewers. Enjoy panoramic sunsets while indulging in flavors that elevate your night out.

name: Japan-ish
summary: Japan-ish offers a unique rooftop experience in Bangkok, combining Spanish and izakaya influences. Under the guidance of Chef Jesus Pascual from the acclaimed Michelin-starred restaurant Arzak, the menu features robata grilling and fresh sushi. This spot promises vibrant events and delicious large sharing plates for an enjoyable night out.

name: Lamaya Bangkok
summary: Perched on the 11th floor, Lamaya Bangkok offers a stunning 360-degree view of the city skyline. Enjoy an extended happy hour with drinks that change daily, making each visit unique. This rooftop bar is perfect for unwinding while soaking in the vibrant atmosphere of Bangkok.

name: The Loft
summary: Perched on the 11th floor, The Loft delivers stunning 360-degree views of the city skyline. Enjoy an extended happy hour that lasts four hours, offering a diverse selection of drinks that change daily. A perfect spot for unwinding with friends or enjoying a romantic evening under the stars.

name: Luz
summary: Luz Tapas Bar on the rooftop of Melia brings a unique blend of Thai ingredients and Spanish flavors, inspired by Chef Laia Ferrer’s Barcelona roots. Opened in September 2023, this venue features both a terrace and rooftop area for an elevated dining experience. Discover a fresh perspective on rooftop dining in On Nut, a neighborhood not traditionally known for it.

name: Nest Rooftop Lounge
summary: Perched on the 11th floor, Nest Rooftop Lounge offers stunning 360-degree views of the city skyline. Enjoy an extended happy hour that lasts four hours, featuring a rotating selection of drinks each day. The atmosphere is perfect for unwinding after a long day or enjoying a night out with friends.

name: Octave
summary: A visit to Octave offers breathtaking views of downtown Sukhumvit from its rooftop perch, making it an ideal spot for friends seeking a memorable skybar experience. The vibrant atmosphere and upbeat crowd enhance the enjoyment of crafted cocktails, albeit at a premium price. Located near Thonglor, this bar is perfect for socializing while soaking in the skyline.

name: O’Shea’s Rooftop Bar and BBQ
summary: O’Shea’s Rooftop Bar and BBQ welcomes pub-goers with a lively atmosphere featuring local bands and affordable beers. Enjoy the spacious park bench seating while catching your favorite sports events in a vibrant setting. Perfect for those looking to unwind with friends, this venue combines great music with a laid-back vibe.

name: Paradise Lost
summary: Tropical vibes flourish at Paradise Lost, a vibrant venue reminiscent of 1960s Miami. The lower floor dazzles with candy pink decor and lush greenery, perfect for an evening escape. Enjoy a refreshing cocktail in one of the cozy, sunset-facing booths or daybeds.

name: Red Sky
summary: Bangkok's nightlife shines at Red Sky, a top-rated rooftop bar known for its vibrant atmosphere and diverse weekly parties. Guests can indulge in delicious food and expertly crafted drinks while enjoying stunning city views. The venue continues to innovate, making it a must-visit for both locals and travelers alike.

name: Scarlett Wine Bar & Restaurant
summary: Scarlett Wine Bar & Restaurant offers a delightful escape high above Silom, boasting stunning river views. Guests can indulge in expertly prepared French comfort food and chargrilled Aussie steaks, complemented by an extensive wine selection. Reservations are essential to secure a spot on the inviting terrace.

name: SIN Rooftop Bar
summary: SIN Rooftop Bar offers a vibrant cocktail experience with stunning river views and a lively atmosphere, perfect for party enthusiasts. The striking DJ booth and expertly crafted cocktails create an energetic vibe, ideal for dancing or simply enjoying the scenery. Whether you're looking to mingle or relax with friends, this bar provides an unforgettable backdrop.

name: Siwilai City Club
summary: Sky Beach, perched on the 78th floor of Bangkok's iconic Mahanakhon building, offers breathtaking 360-degree views of the city skyline. Sip on creative cocktails while enjoying a selection of sweet and savory delights, all set against a vibrant backdrop. With occasional live entertainment, this rooftop bar elevates the nightlife experience to new heights.

name: Sky Beach
summary: Sky Beach offers breathtaking 360-degree views from the 78th floor of Bangkok's iconic Mahanakhon building. Indulge in creative cocktails and delightful treats while soaking up the vibrant energy of the city, enhanced by occasional live entertainment. This rooftop bar elevates your experience, making it a must-visit for skyline enthusiasts.

name: Sky On 20
summary: Sky On 20 offers a relaxed rooftop bar experience with stunning views and affordable cocktails. The ambiance is enhanced by a low-key house soundtrack, creating an inviting space to unwind. Ideal for those seeking a hidden gem in the city, this spot combines quality drinks with great value.

name: The Speakeasy
summary: Step into The Speakeasy, a rooftop cocktail lounge that channels the elegance of the jazz age. With Art Deco decor and a stunning balcony offering 180-degree views of Bangkok's skyline, it's perfect for an evening escape. Enjoy expertly crafted cocktails in a relaxed atmosphere from 6 PM to 1 AM daily.

name: Spectrum Lounge & Bar
summary: Spectrum Lounge & Bar offers a stylish atmosphere with a striking indoor living room featuring elegant design elements. Enjoy two hours of free-flow house wine for B999, making it an enticing choice for social gatherings. With ample space across three levels, this venue is perfect for unwinding or celebrating with friends.

name: Starlight Rooftop Bar
summary: Perched atop the Mercure Hotel, Starlight Rooftop Bar offers a stunning urban escape in Surawong. This cozy venue features an indoor area and a menu crafted by chef Yu Her Bao, while Gongson Sonti mixes up delightful drinks. Ideal for those seeking a lively atmosphere with a view of the sky, it’s perfect for unwinding after a day in the city.

name: Tichuca
summary: Tichuca offers a vibrant escape with its multi-level rooftop adorned in lush jungle décor reminiscent of South Africa. Indulge in signature tiki drinks like the Pineapple Mule while enjoying the stunning sunset views. Arrive early to beat the crowds and soak in the tropical atmosphere as night falls.

name: Tribe
summary: Tribe Sky Beach Club offers a unique tropical escape with stunning skyline views and a vibrant atmosphere. Guests can indulge in day parties or relax by the expansive pool, complete with day beds and a swim-up bar. Swimwear and towels are provided for those who forget their suits, making it an effortless getaway in Bangkok.

name: Tulum Sky Bar
summary: Tulum Sky Bar captures the essence of Tulum with its jungle rooftop setting on the 29th floor of Movenpick Ekkamai. Experience vibrant entertainment including DJs and performances, while sipping on tequila-based cocktails inspired by the Mexican Caribbean. The lush decor features Mayan sculptures and Aztec patterns, creating an enchanting atmosphere for a night out in Bangkok.

name: Vanilla Sky Rooftop
summary: Vanilla Sky Rooftop offers a stylish sky bar experience with a relaxed vibe, illuminated by colorful LED lights. The cocktail menu shines with unique gin and tonic flavors like peppermint and passionfruit, making it a perfect spot for adventurous drinkers. Don't miss the nearby Mojjo bar for rum cocktails in a vibrant Cuban setting.

name: Vertigo and Moon Bar
summary: Experience breathtaking 360-degree views of Bangkok from the legendary Moon Bar, perched atop the Banyan Tree Hotel. This iconic rooftop venue offers a unique perspective of the city's sparkling lights, making it a must-visit despite its touristy reputation. While the prices may reflect its prime location, the stunning vistas are hard to resist for any traveler.

name: Wallflowers Upstairs
summary: Ascend to a hidden rooftop oasis adorned with hanging plants and fairy lights at Wallflowers Upstairs. Delight in international cuisine paired with creative Garden of Eden-themed cocktails in a rustic setting. Open Thursday to Sunday, this bar offers a magical escape from the city below.

name: Yao Rooftop Bar
summary: Yao Rooftop Bar stands out in Bangkok's nightlife, consistently ranked top for its vibrant atmosphere and innovative weekly events. With a blend of lively parties and exceptional food and drinks, it promises an unforgettable experience high above the city. Visitors can enjoy stunning views while indulging in meticulously crafted cocktails and dishes.

name: Leave a Comment
summary: Discover new culinary gems like The Shoyu Stand and Kiri Tsukemen, offering unique dishes that delight the palate. Tsu Na Gu adds to the excitement with its innovative menu options. Explore these fresh additions for a taste of Bangkok's vibrant dining scene.

name: Back to top
summary: Sarnies in Sukhumvit is a must-visit for Bangkok cafe enthusiasts, known for its special brews and cozy ambiance. The menu features delightful comfort breakfast options like miso kombu eggs Benedict with aburi smoked salmon and sourdough pancakes topped with apple miso caramel. Early crowds flock here for both the food and the inviting atmosphere.

name: Progress Cafe
summary: Progress Cafe, nestled within Ari Story hostel, transforms from a cozy daytime cafe to a vibrant bar at night. Indulge in their Black Yuzu cold brew or the refreshing tropical smoothie, both perfect for a sunny day. Pair your drink with a rich chocolate brownie for a delightful treat during your visit.

name: Lucky’s Hungry AFR
summary: Lucky’s Hungry AFR transforms American fried rice with a gourmet twist, featuring Chicken Supreme topped with confit and savory meats. Delight in the unique PB&J milkshake that promises a sweet boost alongside fresh watermelon cheese salad. Experience comfort food elevated to new heights in this exciting new storefront.

name: Kopi Hub Prime Ari
summary: Kopi Hub Prime Ari elevates dimsum with unique ingredients like ikura and truffles, enhancing traditional flavors. Enjoy their famous patongko, deep fried for extra crunch, alongside a variety of flavorful fried tarot options. The Bak Kuh Teh offers a hearty experience that redefines comfort food in a modern setting.

name: Sanan bakery
summary: Sanan Bakery offers a nostalgic taste of home with its family-recipe pastries, perfect for a quick grab before work or school. Signature items like the cone cream and the shio pan ham cheese highlight their commitment to comfort food. Due to high demand, reservations are recommended for this beloved spot.

name: Eggtisan
summary: Eggtisan is a vibrant eatery in Ari, specializing in inventive egg-based dishes crafted by true egg masters. Indulge in the runny eggs sandwich or scrambled eggs with smoked salmon, paired with high-quality coffee offerings. This spot promises a delightful culinary experience for egg lovers and coffee aficionados alike.

name: Libi Home NEW
summary: Explore the flavors of Northern Thailand at Libi Home, where dishes like the curry noodles with grilled chicken take center stage. For a warming breakfast option, the Libi pork noodle soup is highly recommended, or simply enjoy a refreshing espresso or coconut juice. This cozy spot offers a taste of local cuisine in a welcoming atmosphere.

name: Eggdrop
summary: Eggdrop Bangkok brings a taste of Korea with its renowned fluffy egg sandwiches, crafted to perfection. The vibrant red-and-white decor and shiny chrome accents create an inviting diner atmosphere. Don't miss the Mr Egg sandwich, featuring crunchy brioche and sriracha mayo for a delightful bite.

name: Hia Buay
summary: A local favorite for nearly 25 years, Hia Buay serves generous portions of yentafo and braised pork kaprao at unbeatable prices. The traditional banana leaf wrapping enhances the flavors of their takeout meals, making each dish an aromatic delight. Politically endorsed yet authentically humble, this spot is a must-visit for affordable Thai comfort food.

name: Cilantro
summary: Cilantro offers a unique dining experience within the artistic ambiance of GalileOasis. Delight in a variety of dishes, including a turkey and emmental sandwich or spicy Sriracha chicken, all crafted to elevate your taste buds. The venue's chic design fosters connection among art lovers and food enthusiasts alike.

name: Stockroom
summary: Stockroom offers a minimalist vibe deep in Ratchathewi, perfect for brunch and casual conversations. Delight in the truffle cream toast and signature almond tart, both crafted with quality ingredients. This modern cafe strikes a balance between work-friendly ambiance and culinary pleasure.

name: Toby’s
summary: Breakfast at Toby's on Sukhumvit Soi 38 offers a delightful start to the day with a menu featuring favorites like the Egg Mikado and breakfast bruschetta. The Ploenchit location boasts a more corporate interior yet retains the charm that fans love. Enjoy house-cured salmon and poached eggs in a cozy atmosphere perfect for brunch enthusiasts.

name: Sokozy NEW
summary: Nestled near BTS Asoke, Sokozy NEW is a cozy Thai vintage house perfect for starting your day. Enjoy vibrant bowls like the Asok Acai or Pacific Bowl, paired with fresh coffee or buttery croissants. The inviting wooden decor adds to the charm, making it an ideal spot for a relaxed morning meal.

name: Tempered Cooperatives
summary: Tempered Cooperatives is a cacao lover's paradise in Bangkok, offering a unique blend of creative baked goods and exceptional hot chocolate. The cozy cafe features a renovated office space on Soi Ruamrudee 2, perfect for enjoying their new cheesy bacon roll alongside your morning coffee. Don't miss the signature Chocolate Dirty, a delightful hot chocolate topped with espresso.

name: The Pablo NEW
summary: Breakfast enthusiasts will find delight at The Pablo NEW, where a diverse range of morning bites awaits. From hidden gems serving Myanmar snacks to American diners featuring PB&J milkshakes, this spot has something for everyone. Early risers can also enjoy options available before 8am.

name: Iwane Goes Nature
summary: Healthy breakfasts have been a staple at Iwane Goes Nature since 2011, offering options like the hearty Farmer Set and spicy Korean noodles. Located in Asoke, this spot is perfect for those seeking a nutritious start to their day. With affordable prices and a cozy atmosphere, it's a local favorite for breakfast lovers.

name: Sarnies カフェ Sukhumvit
summary: Sarnies カフェ in Sukhumvit has quickly become a go-to spot for coffee enthusiasts and brunch lovers alike. The menu features comforting breakfast options like miso kombu eggs Benedict and sourdough pancakes, each crafted with care. Early crowds flock here for both the inviting atmosphere and the signature Sarnies brew.

name: Luka Sukhumvit 31 NEW
summary: Sarnies' new Sukhumvit location invites cafe enthusiasts to indulge in their signature brews and comforting breakfast dishes. Highlights include miso kombu eggs Benedict with smoked salmon and sourdough pancakes topped with apple miso caramel. This spot is quickly becoming a go-to for those seeking quality bites in a cozy atmosphere.

name: Fest
summary: Located on the ground floor of the Public House hotel, Fest features a revamped menu with enticing dishes like bacon pancakes and a folded breakfast pizza sandwich. Creative vegan options such as No-avocado toast and Tofu Scramble highlight their innovative approach to classic favorites. Open daily from morning until late night, this spot is ideal for brunch or casual meals away from Soi 31's traffic.

name: Chu
summary: Chu stands out in Bangkok's dining scene, renowned for its delectable brunch offerings. Signature dishes like eggs benedict with Sloan’s back bacon and indulgent Belgian waffles satisfy diverse cravings. A cozy atmosphere invites guests to linger over flavorful meals, making it a beloved local spot.

name: BKK Bagels
summary: BKK Bagels in Phrom Phong is a standout spot for bagel lovers in Bangkok, offering a variety of delicious options. The Breakfast Epic with Bacon is a must-try, featuring rich cheeses and perfectly cooked bacon. For an elevated experience, indulge in the Lock, Stock, and Bagel with house-cured salmon.

name: Dos Burros NEW
summary: Dos Burros brings a delightful twist to Mexican cuisine in Thonglor, featuring an inviting breakfast menu that starts at 8am. Signature dishes like huevos rancheros and huevos a la malagena showcase the culinary expertise of brothers Itzco and Tlahui Calva. This new location promises to be a vibrant addition to Bangkok's dining scene.

name: Caffè Olives
summary: Caffè Olives, a creation of the talented team behind L’Olivia, offers a delightful all-day brunch experience. Enjoy dishes like Italian egg shakshuka and focaccia eggs Benedict, perfect for breakfast or lunch. Pair your meal with specialty coffee and indulge in brioche gelato for a sweet finish.

name: Daisie May's Home Cafe
summary: Classic breakfast offerings like croissants and hearty full breakfasts create a delightful menu at this charming café. The cute design and outdoor seating evoke an English garden atmosphere, perfect for families and friends to relax. Located in Ekkamai, it’s an inviting spot that combines comfort with quality food.

name: Rolling Roasters NEW
summary: Rolling Roasters NEW in downtown is a haven for coffee enthusiasts, resembling a futuristic coffee lab. Beyond the expertly brewed coffee, enjoy delightful food options like the Big Brekkie and fruity french toast. This spot invites both early risers and casual visitors to savor quality flavors in a unique setting.

name: Gigi Ekkamai NEW
summary: Gigi Ekkamai brings a fresh take on Italian dining, featuring beloved classics alongside exciting new dishes. Enjoy delightful options like the Dolce Pancakes and Gigi Breakfast, crafted with quality ingredients. A perfect spot for those craving comfort food in a cozy setting.

name: Kynd Kulture NEW
summary: Kynd Kulture caters to vegans with a menu that delights health enthusiasts and Instagram lovers alike. Located on the serene Ekkamai Soi six, it offers delicious options like Hokkaido banana toast and unique dishes such as Young Blood with avocado and quinoa. The vibrant atmosphere makes it a perfect spot for those seeking a wholesome breakfast experience.

name: Holey Mothership Bakery and Cafe
summary: Holey Mothership Bakery and Cafe stands out in Phra Khanong, offering a delightful breakfast experience. Signature dishes like the three egg Pan Eggs and Mighty Shakshuka pair perfectly with an array of pastries and cakes. This cozy spot is a must-visit for brunch enthusiasts looking for quality eats in the neighborhood.

name: Pa Ma Heng The Eatery
summary: Pa Ma Heng The Eatery offers a chic yet homey atmosphere, perfect for breakfast lovers and pet owners alike. The menu features unique twists on classic Thai breakfast dishes, including ka-prow with Australian beef ribeye and salmon. With a spacious setting that resembles a cozy family home, it's an inviting spot to start your day.

name: Laxmi Celebrating of Myanmar Food
summary: A hidden gem in Phra Khanong, Laxmi Celebrating of Myanmar Food offers authentic Myanmar dishes like mohinga noodles, available as early as 6am. Affordable breakfast options include Shan noodles and bean fried rice, perfect for a quick morning meal. For those seeking a flavorful start to the day, the breakfast mala curry promises to awaken your senses.

name: Nicolo Bakery
summary: Chill vibes define Nicolo Bakery, a pet-friendly shophouse nestled between Ekkamai and Phra Khanong. Offering a delectable range of fresh breads and sweet treats like moist brownies and Petite Madeleines at wallet-friendly prices, this stylish space is perfect for morning relaxation. Ideal for dog walkers or anyone seeking a cozy spot to unwind, Nicolo Bakery promises a delightful experience.

name: De Nada
summary: Nestled in a refurbished Thai bungalow off Sukhumvit Soi 56, De Nada offers a tranquil escape with a distinctly French ambiance. Indulge in a variety of pastries, including Nutella-drenched croissants and savory options filled with ham and cheese. This pet-friendly café provides the perfect setting for remote work or leisurely mornings away from the hustle.

name: Pridi
summary: Songwat Coffee Roaster, crafted by the team behind Bangkok's beloved eateries, offers a delightful coffee experience. Enjoy their house blend of Brazil Cerrado, complemented by unique croissants like chestnut mont blanc and black sesame mascarpone. A cozy spot to indulge in artisanal flavors and creative pastries awaits you.

name: Local Boys NEW
summary: Local Boy Coffee invites coffee aficionados to dive into a world of flavors with their signature Coco Box Coffee, featuring coconut ice cream in a chocolate shell. The vibrant atmosphere is enhanced by an upbeat playlist that sets the mood for exploration and enjoyment. This café is perfect for those looking to indulge in unique coffee experiences while enjoying a lively vibe.

name: Ega Luv Seafood NEW
summary: Ega Luv Seafood offers a delightful seafood menu with grilled, steamed, boiled, and baked options in a cozy setting. Morning visitors can also enjoy fusion Asian breakfasts, featuring unique dishes like khao kriap pak mor yuan and udon-style kao ji. This charming spot is perfect for seafood lovers seeking local flavors with a twist.

name: Pulse Phra Arthit NEW
summary: Nestled atop the charming Coconut Culture ice cream shop, Pulse Phra Arthit offers a tranquil retreat from nearby tourist spots. Indulge in delightful baked goods like lemon cake and matcha strawberry soft cookies, perfect for a quick snack. Refresh with their yuzu strawberry soda, an ideal companion for your exploration under the sun.

name: Songwat Coffee Roaster
summary: Songwat Coffee Roaster transforms coffee enjoyment into an art form, resembling a futuristic lab rather than a typical cafe. Ideal for early risers and coffee enthusiasts, it serves delightful dishes like the Big Brekkie and indulgent French toast. This downtown gem combines quality brews with a playful food menu in a unique atmosphere.

name: 5am
summary: 5am specializes in soy milk, offering dark and light roast options that evoke nostalgic flavors. The dark roast features a smoky aroma, while the light roast recalls childhood memories of school mornings. Pair your drink with the patongko honey lemon for a delightful twist on honey toast topped with soft serve.

name: On Lok Yun
summary: Step back in time at On Lok Yun, a beloved breakfast spot with a rich 90-year history. The cafe offers a Thai twist on Western classics, featuring the must-try kanom pang sankaya and affordable coffee options. Ideal for early risers seeking both nostalgia and delicious flavors.

name: Punjab Sweets
summary: Discover a delightful breakfast at Punjab Sweets, located in Phahurat. Indulge in crispy paneer dosa and rich barfi bites, perfectly paired with freshly brewed chai tea. This Indian coffee shop promises a unique start to your day with its tempting array of sweet treats.

name: Tarns Coffee NEW
summary: Nestled within the Ari Story hostel, Tarns Coffee transforms from a cozy cafe by day to a vibrant bar at night. Indulge in their refreshing Black Yuzu cold brew paired with a decadent chocolate brownie for a delightful treat. Smoothie lovers can savor the tropical blend that captures the essence of pina colada without the alcohol.

name: Halfway NEW
summary: Halfway NEW stands out in Bangkok's brunch scene with its unique Asian-Aussie fusion dishes. The dry-aged duck Congee, paired with a creamy egg yolk and patongko, is a must-try, while the Veggie Mary offers a refreshing twist for those seeking something sweet yet satisfying. This hidden gem promises an enjoyable experience for food lovers looking to explore new flavors.

name: DYSF NEW
summary: DYSF NEW is a charming two-story cafe in Sathon, perfect for brunch or late-night bites. The menu features unique apple-infused dishes, like the signature iced tea with diced apples and a hearty fried chicken breakfast with kimchi pancakes. Experience a refreshing twist on comfort food in a cozy setting that emphasizes fresh ingredients.

name: Chennai Kitchen
summary: Chennai Kitchen serves up essential vegetarian Indian breakfast dishes with a flavorful twist. Indulge in their ghee dosa or try the spicy idli Manchurian, deep-fried lentil patties in a tangy sauce. Don't forget to pair your meal with a refreshing lassi for the complete experience.

name: Take Eat Easy NEW
summary: A backyard-style eatery in Yenakart, Take Eat Easy offers all-day dining with a focus on Northern Californian cuisine. Breakfast options include a quick set with eggs and coffee for B200 or a hearty Full Breakfast for B450. Tim Butler's latest venture promises a cozy atmosphere and satisfying meals any time of day.

name: Gowin Dimsum NEW
summary: Gowin Dimsum elevates traditional dim sum with luxurious ingredients like ikura and truffles. Signature dishes include the crunchy patongko and flavorful Bak Kuh Teh, making this spot a must-visit for food enthusiasts. A diverse selection of fried taro in various flavors adds to the unique experience.

name: Just A Drink Maybe
summary: Just A Drink Maybe offers a cozy retreat for Sathorn-Silom locals, known for its gin-based cocktails and customizable breakfast options. The standout dish, 'the GOAT' bagel sandwich, combines crispy bacon with rich cream cheese and fresh vegetables. A perfect spot to start your day or unwind with friends after hours.

name: Crema Cafe and Books
summary: Crema Cafe and Books, a charming spot near Chong Nonsi BTS station, features vibrant decor and a cozy atmosphere perfect for book lovers. Indulge in their smoked salmon cream cheese bagel or the delightful yuzu earl gray creme brulee donut. This artsy cafe invites you to sip coffee while exploring an intriguing collection of photo books and magazines.

name: Bhu Mai
summary: Bhu Mai, nestled on the first floor of IconSiam, exudes an ambiance of vintage luxury highlighted by dark earthy tones and Thai accents. Indulge in a variety of massages, including a traditional Thai massage that promises relaxation and rejuvenation. Open daily from 10:00 to 22:00, this serene retreat is perfect for unwinding amidst a backdrop of jasmine garlands and silk upholstery.

name: Dip Onsen
summary: Dip Onsen features modern pools surrounded by a lush tropical garden, creating a youthful and relaxing atmosphere. Ideal for unwinding and enjoying quality time, the venue welcomes visitors daily from 8 am to 10 pm. General admission is available at a reasonable price in the Phaya Thai area.

name: Health Land
summary: Health Land offers a calm and sophisticated spa experience in Phrom Phong, focusing on intricate details that enhance relaxation. With treatments ranging from traditional Thai massages to the luxurious Ultimate Couple Hydrosense package, guests can indulge in top-notch services. High-tech options like the Hydrafacial ensure a rejuvenating visit without compromising on comfort or care.

name: Makkha Health & Spa
summary: Makkha Health & Spa offers a serene escape with its sophisticated and detail-oriented approach to wellness. Treatments range from traditional Thai massages starting at B800 to an extravagant Ultimate Couple Hydrosense experience priced at B20,000. Indulge in high-tech skin treatments like the HydraFacial for a rejuvenating experience that combines luxury with personalized care.

name: Harnn Spa
summary: Harnn Spa invites relaxation in a serene setting adorned with modern Thai decor and ample natural light. Experience the Pranakorn therapy, a 60-minute traditional Thai massage that blends yoga-like movements to enhance mobility and relieve muscle tension. Additional treatments include aromatherapy, acupuncture, and reflexology.

name: Infinity
summary: Infinity offers a rejuvenating escape with its signature Thai and aromatherapy massages. The 60-minute aroma treatment is priced at B1,300, while the 90-minute deep tissue option, designed to relieve muscle tension, costs B1,600. Experience improved energy flow and relaxation in a serene environment.

name: Let’s Relax Spa
summary: Let’s Relax Spa features a serene atmosphere enhanced by Thai-inspired design elements. Guests can indulge in a 120-minute Thai massage or a soothing aromatic hot stone treatment. Located on the 2nd floor of Park Lane Community Mall, this spa promises relaxation from 10am to midnight daily.

name: Oasis Spa
summary: Oasis Spa offers a calm and sophisticated retreat in Phrom Phong, focusing on intricate details that enhance your relaxation experience. Treatments range from affordable traditional Thai massages to luxurious couples' packages featuring hydrotherapy and personalized services. High-tech options like the Hydrafacial ensure a modern touch to classic wellness.

name: Rarinjinda
summary: Rarinjinda offers a luxurious spa experience with three distinct massage options, each designed to rejuvenate the body and mind. The standout RarinJinda royal touch combines multiple relaxing treatments for a comprehensive pampering session. Pricing ranges from B1,700 for the aromatherapy oil massage to B5,600 for the ultimate royal touch.

name: Yunomori
summary: Yunomori serves as a serene escape from the urban hustle, featuring a relaxing garden lounge and rooftop with tea and sky views. Indulge in deep sleep massages at this tranquil haven located on North Sathorn Road, Silom. Open daily from 10:00 AM to midnight, it's perfect for unwinding in a peaceful atmosphere.

name: Auriga at Cappella
summary: Auriga at Cappella offers a calm and sophisticated spa experience, perfect for those seeking relaxation. Attention to detail is evident in their luxurious treatments, from traditional Thai massages to the extravagant Ultimate Couple Hydrosense package. With prices ranging from B800 to B20,000, this spa caters to various preferences while ensuring quality service.

name: Breeze Spa
summary: Breeze Spa offers an intimate retreat with mood lighting and stylish ocean-hued decor. The Energy Boost package combines a turmeric and lemongrass scrub, a Thai oil massage, and a rejuvenating facial for a holistic experience. Located in Amari Watergate Bangkok, it's perfect for those seeking relaxation in the heart of Pratunam.

name: Loft Thai X Nakhon Spa
summary: A serene oasis awaits at Loft Thai X Nakhon Spa, where tranquility and refinement blend seamlessly. Offering a range of spa treatments, from traditional Thai massages to luxurious packages for couples, this spa caters to all relaxation needs. Open daily until midnight, it promises an indulgent escape any day of the week.

name: Websites
summary: The World Gourmet Festival 2025 is set to feature an impressive lineup of renowned chefs and culinary experiences. With a focus on gourmet dining, this event promises to showcase the best in gastronomy. Food enthusiasts should mark their calendars for this extraordinary celebration of culinary arts.

name: Nitra Serenity Centre at 137 Pillars
summary: Experience a unique blend of modern spa design and Thai exotic art at Nitra Serenity Centre. Enjoy the signature Nitra Raya treatment in a tranquil environment that feels both homey and clinical. Open daily from 10am to 8pm, it's a perfect escape in the bustling city.

name: Neighborhoo
summary: Neighborhoo offers a unique blend of modern spa design infused with Thai exotic art, creating a serene yet clinical atmosphere. The signature Nitra Raya treatment promises a rejuvenating experience in this inviting space. Open daily from 10 AM to 8 PM, it's an ideal escape for relaxation enthusiasts.

name: Okura
summary: A serene atmosphere and refined decor contribute to a luxurious sanctuary at Okura, making it an ideal escape from the city's hustle. The spa offers soothing treatments, including a lavender escape package designed for relaxation. Open daily from 10am to 8pm, it's perfect for those seeking tranquility.

name: I.Sawan Residential Spa
summary: I.Sawan Residential Spa offers a serene villa-style retreat with luxurious interiors. Indulge in their energy escape package, featuring a Himalayan crystal scrub and sports massage, or opt for the signature escape with skin conditioning and facial cleansing. Located on the 5th floor of Grand Hyatt Erawan Bangkok, this spa promises a rejuvenating experience from 9 AM to 10 PM daily.

name: Banyan Tree Spa Bangkok
summary: Banyan Tree Spa Bangkok offers a serene escape with stunning panoramic views of the city skyline. Designed in traditional Thai style, this spa features dramatic accents that enhance its tranquil atmosphere. Open daily from 10:00 to 20:00, it's a perfect haven for relaxation.

name: Panpuri Organic Spa at Park Hyatt Bangkok
summary: Panpuri Organic Spa at Park Hyatt Bangkok offers a serene oasis filled with natural light and minimalist decor. Indulge in their 'Ultimate relaxation package' for a luxurious experience that rejuvenates the body and mind. Open daily from 10:00 to 22:30, it's a perfect retreat for relaxation enthusiasts.

name: Opium Spa
summary: Indulge in a luxurious pampering experience at Opium Spa with their Serenity at the Siam package. This 240-minute treatment features Himalayan salt exfoliation, a soothing steam session, and a full-body massage using premium Sodashi oils. Complete your visit with a rejuvenating French clay body mask and thermal infusion facial for ultimate relaxation.

name: Sukhothai Spa
summary: Sukhothai Spa offers a luxurious escape with indulgent packages that include deluxe accommodations and wellness treatments. Experience their signature 60-minute massage, which features a foot treatment, or elevate your stay with a bath ritual. Perfect for those seeking relaxation in an upscale setting.

name: Calm Cottage
summary: Calm Cottage in Phrom Phong offers a serene escape with a sophisticated ambiance, perfect for rejuvenation. The spa features an impressive array of treatments, including the luxurious 'Ultimate Couple Hydrosense' experience and high-tech Hydrafacial sessions. Attention to detail ensures every visit feels personalized and special, making it a delightful retreat.

name: Lime by Us
summary: Lime by Us offers a refreshing twist on cocktails, focusing on fruity and approachable creations. As a sister project to the acclaimed Bar Us, it aims to impress with its vibrant menu. Nestled in the same building, this new bar is perfect for those seeking a lively atmosphere and innovative drinks.

name: Beer Pradith
summary: Beer Pradith stands out in the vibrant Banthat Thong area, offering a unique selection of 24 Thai craft beers. The venue captures the spirit of the neighborhood with its blend of old-school street food and modern café culture. A must-visit for beer enthusiasts looking to explore local brews from across Thailand.

name: Backroom
summary: Nestled in the bustling Sathorn district, Backroom offers a serene escape with expertly crafted cocktails and high-quality seafood sourced from across Thailand. The bar's innovative clarification technique ensures smooth sips that elevate the drinking experience. Enjoy a moment of tranquility amidst the city's chaos while indulging in delightful flavors.

name: Jiaozi Jiuba
summary: Jiaozi Jiuba brings its beloved dumplings to Gaysorn Amarin, delighting guests with signature dishes and an exciting cocktail menu. The Hutong Bay cocktail offers a unique twist, combining sweet and sour flavors with spicy bay leaves and mala powder for a refreshing experience. Open daily from 11am to 9pm, this spot is perfect for a casual meal or an after-work drink.

name: Sababa
summary: Sababa offers a unique fusion of Mediterranean izakaya in the lush surroundings of Thonglor 13. Enjoy a selection of imported wines and signature cocktails, each inspired by popular flavors. A cozy atmosphere makes it an ideal spot for a relaxed evening with friends or a special date.

name: Frog Bar
summary: Frog Bar invites patrons into a world where Japanese literature meets local flavors, creating a unique cocktail experience. Signature drinks like the Nikolaschka and Haruki Murakami-inspired creations offer a blend of classic and innovative tastes. This bar's atmosphere resonates with fans of both anime and cocktails, making it a must-visit for adventurous drinkers.

name: Bukowski & Co.
summary: Bukowski & Co. offers a unique bar experience inspired by the iconic Shakespeare and Company bookstore in Paris. Featuring a rotating roster of bartenders, each visit promises a fresh and personalized interaction. The menu, influenced by films, adds an artistic twist to your drinks.

name: Akara Sky Hanuman
summary: Perched on the 61st floor, Akara Sky Hanuman offers a stunning view and a taste of Thai culture through its unique cocktails. Signature drinks crafted by Suchada Sopajaree feature local fruits, with the standout Farang combining pink guava, vodka, and espresso for an invigorating experience. Ideal for both tourists and locals, this venue promises a vibrant night out in Bangkok.

name: Fatboy Izakaya Amarin
summary: Fatboy Izakaya Amarin brings a lively atmosphere to Gaysorn Amarin, serving delicious Japanese cuisine and cocktails with a twist. Signature drinks like the O-Ren Ishi offer a refreshing blend of tropical flavors, ideal for sunset enjoyment. This new branch is perfect for those looking to indulge in great food while soaking in the vibrant vibe.

name: Blessing Shophouse
summary: Blessing Shophouse offers a unique cocktail experience with Chinese-Thai inspired drinks crafted from ingredients believed to bring good fortune. Guests are welcomed with complimentary oolong tea, setting a calming atmosphere for the evening. Open Wednesday to Sunday, this bar is perfect for those seeking something special in Asoke.

name: Nova Social Club
summary: Nova Social Club, located just minutes from Phra Khanong BTS, offers a unique cocktail lounge experience. Inspired by six atmospheric levels, the menu features innovative flavor profiles that captivate the senses. This new bar complements the renowned Cielo Sky Bar, adding a fresh vibe to Sukhumvit nightlife.

name: Amaris Cocktail Bar
summary: Amaris Cocktail Bar, a fresh addition to Bangkok's vibrant nightlife, brings a fruitier twist to cocktails in a stylish setting. Recently recognized as Best Cocktail Bar at the BAD Awards 2024, it complements its sister venue with an approachable drink menu that aims to impress. Guests can expect an inviting atmosphere perfect for both casual outings and special occasions.

name: Dry Wave Cocktail Studio
summary: Renowned mixologist Supawit 'Palm' Muttarattana has opened Dry Wave Cocktail Studio, a haven for cocktail enthusiasts. The unique 'Super Classic' concept merges iconic cocktails, exemplified by the bestselling Morning Tijuana, which combines smoky mezcal with tropical flavors. Experience Palm's artistry in an inviting space dedicated to classic mixology.

name: Brut
summary: Brut is a hidden speakeasy in Ari, where brutalist architecture inspires both the ambiance and the cocktail menu. The drinks reflect influences from film and literature, with unique creations like the Boise cocktail, featuring fruity notes and jasmine syrup. A visit promises an artistic experience that blends culture with mixology.

name: GOD Bar
summary: GOD Bar, short for Genius On Drugs, presents an innovative drinking experience with a menu that pushes boundaries. The co-founders have crafted a unique concept where drinks are paired with small bites that complement and contrast each other. Expect an atmosphere that embraces the philosophy of 'excessive is necessary'.

name: Rogues Bar
summary: Rogues Bar invites everyone to enjoy a unique cocktail experience inspired by global capitals. Each drink, like the Gatsby-themed Salute To The World and the smoky Samurai Angel, tells a story through its flavors. A curated jazz soundtrack adds an elegant backdrop to this lively setting.

name: Tribe Sky Beach Club
summary: A stylish tropical oasis, Tribe Sky Beach Club offers a unique sky beach experience in Bangkok. Guests can lounge by the expansive pool or dance to vibrant music as the sun sets, creating an electrifying atmosphere. Enjoy Neapolitan pizza and fruity cocktails while soaking in stunning skyline views.

name: Pili Pala
summary: Pili Pala Drunken Room in Silom offers a whimsical escape with its locomotive-themed decor and vibrant fruity cocktails. Signature drinks feature fruit-infused alcohols that deliver a delightful balance of sweetness and intensity. Ideal for those looking to unwind, this venue promises an enjoyable experience without the heavy buzz.

name: 4th Wall
summary: A vibrant hub for cocktail enthusiasts, 4th Wall thrives on a rotating selection of classic drinks that change daily. The bar's unique twist on guacamole, combining Thai seafood sauce with avocado, is a must-try. Experience the charm of this local favorite where every visit offers something new.

name: Lloyd’s Club
summary: Lloyd’s Club, nestled in the Metropole Bangkok, offers a cozy escape with its private bar and seasonal cocktails. The intimate second floor features private chambers ideal for personalized gatherings. Experience a unique atmosphere crafted by the creators of popular local spots like Tichuca and Bar Scofflaws.

name: Tulum Sky Bar
summary: Cielo Sky Bar offers a unique cocktail experience just minutes from Phra Khanong BTS station. The innovative menu draws inspiration from six atmospheric levels, creating distinct flavor profiles. Enjoy the vibrant atmosphere at one of the highest bars along the Sukhumvit line.

name: Allso Bar
summary: Affordable craft cocktails await at Allso Bar, a hidden gem in the Thonglor area. With a focus on mixology takeovers and unique theme nights, this shophouse bar aims to make quality drinks accessible to all. Signature offerings like the Thaipirina showcase creativity without breaking the bank.

name: Maria Bar
summary: Maria Bar transforms Phra Khanong into a stylish destination for wine and cocktails, featuring the signature Blessing cocktail with its stunning hues. The atmosphere is perfect for sharing moments over their crowd favorite Friend's Triple Dip, which offers a trio of fries and sauces. Ideal for casual dates or hangouts, this bar blends chic vibes with local charm.

name: Ang Yi
summary: Celebrate milestones and catch up with friends at one of Bangkok's hottest nightlife spots. Ang Yi offers a vibrant atmosphere perfect for partying through the rest of 2024 in style. Discover the city's lively scene and make unforgettable memories together.

name: Last Call Bar
summary: Last Call Bar redefines classic cocktails with a focus on quality and simplicity. Renowned mixologist Vipop Jinaphan crafts customized drinks from a curated selection of beer, champagne, and sake. This intimate venue invites guests to enjoy expertly made beverages in a cozy atmosphere.

name: The Brass & Cigar Lounge
summary: Tucked beside the French Sathorn restaurant, The Brass & Cigar Lounge offers a stylish art nouveau ambiance. A unique drink menu reflects seasonal inspirations, featuring gin-based cocktails for spring and warm vodka absinthe concoctions for winter. This bar provides a cozy yet sophisticated atmosphere, perfect for those seeking an elegant evening out.

name: Good Old Times
summary: Good Old Times offers a unique nightlife experience that evolves from a cozy speakeasy to an energetic nightclub featuring 80s and 90s hits. Signature cocktails like the Bee’s Knees and Low ABV Espresso Martini showcase creative twists on classic flavors. An ideal spot for those looking to enjoy a nostalgic night out with friends.

name: Invitation Only
summary: Located on the 55th floor of Empire Tower in Sathorn, Invitation Only offers a stunning panoramic sunset view. The bar specializes in nostalgic cocktails crafted from homemade ingredients and features a serious food menu with dishes like piri piri chicken skewers and lamb chop chimichurri. This unique spot combines a lively atmosphere with quality offerings, making it a must-visit for both drinks and dining.

name: Tic Tac Toe
summary: Tic Tac Toe offers a unique dating bar experience atop Emsphere, designed for social mingling and fun. With upscale decor, private areas, and a vibrant dance floor, it guarantees an entertaining night with top-notch DJ music. Guests can even personalize their night by showcasing names on LED screens, adding a special touch to the atmosphere.

name: Raze Arcade
summary: Raze Arcade brings a vibrant nightlife experience to EmWonder, blending retro New York vibes with thrilling Formula 1 elements. Guests can enjoy high-energy tunes and creative cocktails while engaging in the main attraction: an F1 simulator arcade game. A large TV screen ensures race fans won't miss a moment of the action.

name: Leave a Comment
summary: Explore the latest culinary gems in town, featuring unique offerings at The Shoyu Stand, Kiri Tsukemen, and Tsu Na Gu. Each restaurant brings a fresh take on traditional flavors, inviting food lovers to discover new favorites. Ideal for adventurous diners seeking a taste of the unexpected.

name: Jiaozi JiubaPhoto:Jiaozi Jiuba
summary: Jiaozi Jiuba has transitioned from a beloved dumpling spot in Samyan to an exciting new venue at Gaysorn Amarin, offering signature dishes alongside creative cocktails. The Hutong Bay cocktail combines the sweet and sour essence of a piña colada with a unique kick from bay leaves and mala powder. Experience this vibrant atmosphere daily from 11 AM to 9 PM.

name: SababaPhoto: Sababa
summary: Sababa offers a unique fusion of Mediterranean and izakaya cuisine in a cozy Thonglor setting. Signature cocktails like the Parmesan Espresso Martini complement an impressive selection of imported wines. This venue promises a delightful experience for food and drink enthusiasts alike.

name: Bukowski & Co.Photo: Bukowski & Co. / BK Magazine
summary: Bukowski & Co. offers a unique blend of community and spontaneity, reminiscent of the iconic Shakespeare and Company bookstore in Paris. With a rotating cast of bartenders, each visit promises a personalized experience shaped by their distinct styles. The menu, inspired by films, invites patrons to enjoy a cinematic twist while socializing in this vibrant space.

name: 4th WallPhoto: 4th Wall / BK Magazine
summary: 4th Wall excels in Bangkok's cocktail scene with a dynamic menu that features rotating classic drinks and niche favorites. The venue pairs its beverages with creative snacks, like a local twist on guacamole that incorporates Thai seafood sauce. Experience the vibrant atmosphere where each visit offers something new to savor.

name: Lloyd’s ClubPhoto: Lloyd’s Club
summary: Lloyd’s Club offers an exclusive atmosphere within the Metropole Bangkok, featuring a cozy open bar on the first level. Seasonal cocktails and off-menu classics are complemented by delicious nibbles, creating a vibrant yet intimate experience. The second floor boasts private chambers ideal for personalized gatherings, making it perfect for special occasions.

name: Al Gatto Nero
summary: Al Gatto Nero is a charming trattoria that showcases the best of Italian cuisine, featuring freshly made pasta and pizzas from their own oven. The slow-cooked beef cheek, stewed in rich red wine sauce, offers a tender texture that's easy to enjoy with just a fork. This inviting space is perfect for those looking to indulge in authentic Italian flavors in Asoke.

name: Al Saray
summary: Al Saray in Sathorn offers a unique blend of Lebanese and Indian flavors, perfect for a satisfying lunch away from the office. The venue's intriguing 'flavor meets entertainment' concept sets the stage for an engaging dining experience. Just a short BTS ride from Silom, it's an accessible gem for food lovers.

name: Baba
summary: Baba offers a cozy yet upscale dining experience with its casual Indian bites at Marche Thonglor. The menu showcases fire and smoke mastery, featuring dishes like black truffle cream cheese naan and spicy lamb vindaloo. Seasonal Thai produce enhances the authenticity of their imported Indian ingredients.

name: Besides Umi
summary: Besides Umi offers a refreshing take on omakase, perfect for unwinding after work. Small plates like binjin tomato in dashi jelly and charcoal grilled bigfin reef squid complement an impressive sushi selection. Enjoy a variety of individual dishes or sharing platters in a relaxed atmosphere.

name: Cento
summary: Cento is one of the exciting new restaurants making waves in Bangkok's culinary scene. Offering a vibrant selection of New Orleans cuisine among other dishes, it caters to diverse foodie tastes. Discover what makes this spot a must-visit as the year progresses.

name: Cheese and Dough
summary: Cheese and Dough offers a cozy dining experience with casual Indian bites that showcase fire and smoke mastery. Imported ingredients from India combined with local seasonal produce create authentic dishes like black truffle cream cheese naan and spicy lamb vindaloo. Enjoy a refreshing mimosa to start your meal in this upscale setting.

name: Darlin You’re So Fine
summary: A unique cafe in Sathon, Darlin You’re So Fine emphasizes the versatility of apples with creative dishes like apple cranberry salad and caramelized apple bruschetta. Beyond apple-themed offerings, a selection of pastas and classic brunch items ensures there's something for everyone. Enjoy a cozy atmosphere perfect for both brunch and late-night dining.

name: Dough Bros
summary: Dough Bros showcases the vibrant flavors of New Orleans, bringing a unique culinary twist to Bangkok's dining scene. With an exciting menu featuring homemade pizza and hot ramen specialties, it caters to every type of foodie. Explore this trendy spot for a taste of something fresh and delicious in the city.

name: Dos Burros
summary: Dos Burros brings a vibrant Mexican breakfast experience to the Southside of Thonglor, featuring dishes like huevos rancheros and huevos a la malagena. Open at 8am, this spot complements its offerings with fresh coffee and orange juice. The culinary legacy of brothers Itzco and Tlahui Calva shines through in every bite.

name: Earthy Society
summary: Earthy Society offers a refreshing brunch experience in Bangkok, focusing on local Thai ingredients. Signature dishes like Turkish Poached Eggs feature organic eggs sourced from Nakhon Pathom, while the fish and chips change weekly based on local catches. This innovative approach invites guests to explore traditional flavors in a contemporary setting.

name: Ega Luv Seafood
summary: Ega Luv Seafood offers a delightful twist on local Thai cuisine with a focus on fresh seafood. Dishes like the sunny side galaxy shrimp platter showcase their creative approach, featuring large shrimp paired with three sunny-side-up eggs. This new spot promises an exciting dining experience on Songwat street.

name: Enishi Ramen Bangkok
summary: Located in the bustling One City Centre, Enishi Ramen Bangkok offers a taste of Singapore's ramen scene with its premium noodles and rich broths. The Dan Dan Noodle is a must-try, featuring a flavorful blend of pork, duck, and spices topped with an onsen tamago. Perfect for busy city dwellers seeking a satisfying meal.

name: Et 1.5
summary: Et 1.5 offers a unique all-day brunch experience with a commitment to sustainability, sourcing produce from their own farm and local suppliers. Enjoy dishes like organic Turkish Eggs, featuring poached eggs and homemade yogurt, crafted from fresh ingredients. This eatery not only satisfies cravings but also promotes eco-friendly practices.

name: Feaw
summary: Feaw, located within the Racquet Club, caters to both fitness enthusiasts and food lovers alike. The menu features comforting street food like crispy deep-fried pork wonton and kaprao topped with Aussie beef. This community dining spot is perfect for a post-workout meal in Thonglor.

name: Fatboy Izakaya Amarin
summary: Fatboy Izakaya Amarin offers a vibrant atmosphere for enjoying Japanese cuisine in the heart of Gaysorn Amarin. The menu features crowd favorites like the crispy chicken skin and the signature Fatboy Roll, which combines fresh ingredients with luxurious toppings. With plans for exclusive additions, this spot promises an exciting experience for food lovers.

name: Gaggan at Louis Vuitton
summary: Fine dining meets high fashion at Gaggan in Ratchaprasong, where Chef Gaggan Anand redefines progressive Indian cuisine. Expect a culinary journey that plays with the five essential tastes: sweet, sour, salty, spicy, and surprise. This unique blend of haute cuisine and luxury offers an unforgettable dining experience.

name: Gowin Dimsum
summary: Gowin Dimsum offers a fresh take on classic dim sum dishes, perfect for food enthusiasts craving new flavors. Located in the heart of Bangkok, this spot is part of a vibrant wave of recent culinary openings. Expect a cozy atmosphere that invites both solo diners and groups to indulge in delicious bites.

name: Grok 1970
summary: Grok 1970 offers a vibrant taste of New Orleans cuisine amidst Bangkok's bustling food scene. This spot is perfect for anyone craving unique ramen specialties and homemade pizzas. Discover culinary delights that cater to every type of foodie, making it a must-visit destination in the city.

name: Honobono Ramen
summary: Honobono Ramen serves up delicious craft ramen in Udom Suk, eliminating the need to trek to Thonglor for a satisfying bowl. The shoyu ramen, featuring chicken broth and seafood, is complemented by tender sous vide chicken and marinated eggs. For those seeking a unique taste, the shio ramen offers an aromatic experience straight from the sea.

name: Horsamut
summary: Discover the vibrant culinary scene of Bangkok with 50 exciting new restaurants that have opened this year. From New Orleans cuisine to innovative ramen specialties, there's something for every palate. Dive into this diverse selection and find your next favorite dining spot.

name: Illy Cafe
summary: Illy Cafe, a renowned global brand, brings its first Thai location to Erawan. Enjoy Italian classics like fusilli pesto and mortadella sandwiches alongside exquisite desserts such as the multi-layered coffee bean treat. Experience a chic atmosphere that elevates your coffee break into a culinary delight.

name: Jaja Bistro
summary: A culinary journey awaits at Jaja Bistro, where the vibrant flavors of New Orleans come alive. This hotspot features an eclectic menu that caters to every food lover's craving, from innovative ramen dishes to homemade pizzas. Discover a lively atmosphere perfect for enjoying exquisite bites with friends or family.

name: Jharokha by Indus
summary: Experience innovative Indian cuisine at Jharokha by Indus, where Chef Sanket Hoskote brings traditional flavors to life with custom charcoal ovens. Signature dishes include buttercream king oyster mushrooms and Batak Seekh Kebab, grilled to perfection. The elegant interiors evoke the charm of historical polo clubs, making it a perfect setting for a memorable meal.

name: Jiaozi Jiuba
summary: Jiaozi Jiuba offers a vibrant dining experience, showcasing the latest trends in the culinary scene of Bangkok. With a focus on enticing flavors and innovative dishes, it caters to every type of foodie. Discover this new gem among the city's diverse restaurant offerings.

name: Kamakiri Udon
summary: Kamakiri Udon stands out in Bangkok's culinary scene by catering specifically to udon enthusiasts with fresh noodles from Fukuoka. During lunch, savor their exclusive noodle dishes, while evenings transform the ambiance into a lively izakaya. Don't miss the Mentai Tororo Egg, a unique udon bowl that showcases mentaiko and tororo yam topped with a fresh egg.

name: Kataru
summary: Kataru is one of the hottest new eateries to emerge in 2024, showcasing a diverse menu that caters to every type of foodie. From New Orleans specialties to innovative ramen dishes and homemade pizzas, there's something for everyone. This vibrant spot promises to satisfy culinary cravings and keep diners coming back for more.

name: Kenny’s Phrom Phong
summary: Kenny’s Phrom Phong brings craft ramen directly to Udom Suk, eliminating the need for traffic jams in nearby Thonglor. Indulge in their shoyu ramen featuring a chicken broth with seafood, complemented by sous vide chicken and chashu pork. The shio ramen offers an aromatic taste of the sea that's hard to resist.

name: Kokugura Ramen
summary: Ari's culinary scene welcomes Kokugura Ramen, a haven for ramen enthusiasts. Chef Kulapol “Air” Samsen brings his Michelin-star experience to craft exceptional bowls, drawing inspiration from 23 renowned ramen shops in Japan. As night falls, the space transforms into a sake bar offering classic Japanese dishes, perfect for an evening out.

name: Kuma no Yakitori
summary: Kuma no Yakitori brings the essence of Osaka's fine dining to Bangkok with its omakase experience focused on skewered chicken. Enjoy a unique 16-course menu that showcases various parts of the chicken, from crispy skin to delicate sashimi. This accessible branch invites all diners to indulge in a culinary journey that celebrates every aspect of this beloved ingredient.

name: Kwann
summary: Kwann offers an innovative take on Thai fine dining, showcasing firewood-cooked dishes crafted by acclaimed chefs. Seasonal ingredients from local producers ensure a menu that evolves with every visit, creating a unique culinary experience. Try the Thai Wagyu Beef Tartare for a surprising delight that redefines raw meat.

name: Long John Silver’s
summary: Long John Silver’s brings American fast food seafood to Bangkok, offering a taste of the ocean with dishes like crispy fish and chips. Signature items include the Bucket Shrimp and Chicken and Shrimp combo, perfect for those seeking a hearty meal. This new spot is an adventurous choice for Thai fans eager to try something different from their usual fare.

name: Mickey’s Diner
summary: Mickey’s Diner brings American classics to life with hearty meals inspired by Chef Chalee Kader’s time in San Francisco. Indulge in comfort food favorites like fried chicken and waffles or a robust breakfast featuring Canadian bacon and homemade fries. This cozy spot invites families for a satisfying meal in a welcoming atmosphere.

name: Nila
summary: Nila, located in the luxurious Amari Bangkok, showcases an exquisite tasting menu that highlights coastal Goan cuisine. Under the expertise of Chef Bharath S Bhat, guests can savor the rich flavors of seafood, coconut, and spices. This new dining experience is a must-visit for lovers of Indian fine dining in Bangkok.

name: Onggi
summary: Onggi, meaning earthenware in Korean, showcases authentic fermented ingredients in a fine dining atmosphere. Located on the 55th floor of Empire Tower, it offers stunning views paired with exquisite dishes. Injin Kim's passion project invites you to indulge in a unique culinary experience that is both traditional and elevated.

name: Ore
summary: Explore the vibrant culinary scene with 50 new restaurants that have emerged in Bangkok this year. From New Orleans specialties to unique ramen dishes, there's something for every foodie. Discover your next favorite dining spot and indulge in delicious homemade cuisine.

name: The Pablo Bangkok
summary: The Pablo Bangkok introduces a vibrant all-day dining experience inspired by South American flavors, situated on the bustling Asoke street. Signature dishes like the eggs benny and hearty breakfast plate highlight fresh ingredients with a kick from spicy sausage and thick bacon. Perfect for brunch lovers looking to indulge in a lively atmosphere.

name: Pah Jong
summary: Pah Jong offers a unique twist on fried rice with over 64 customizable combinations. Choose from bases like jasmine or Japanese rice and pair them with sauces such as squid ink or truffle for a personalized dish. This innovative approach elevates a classic favorite into an exciting dining experience.

name: Rangoon Tea House
summary: Rangoon Tea House, located within The Racquet Club in Thonglor, offers a community dining experience perfect for post-workout cravings. Enjoy comfort street food like crispy deep-fried pork wontons and kaprao topped with Aussie beef, crafted by the team behind R-Haan. This spot seamlessly blends fitness and food, making it a unique gathering place for locals.

name: Roberta's
summary: Roberta's delivers a vibrant culinary experience with its New Orleans fare and unique ramen specialties. Homemade pizzas add to the charm, making it a must-visit for food lovers. Discover your next favorite dish in this exciting new restaurant scene.

name: Ruay Mitr
summary: Ruay Mitr in Ekkamai showcases a vibrant dining scene with a diverse menu that caters to various palates. The restaurant is part of a curated list featuring 50 new spots for food enthusiasts, highlighting innovative dishes and flavors. Discover unique culinary experiences that promise to delight every type of foodie.

name: Sababa
summary: Sababa offers a unique fusion of Mediterranean and Japanese cuisine in a cozy Thonglor setting. Chef Maxim Baile crafts shareable dishes like Pistachio Carbonara and Challans Chicken Couscous, perfect for gatherings. This lush hideaway is ideal for those seeking a vibrant dining experience with friends and family.

name: Smizzle
summary: Smizzle in Ari offers a vibrant culinary experience with an array of New Orleans-inspired dishes and unique ramen specialties. This hotspot caters to diverse palates, ensuring every foodie finds something delightful. A must-visit for those looking to explore the latest dining trends in Bangkok.

name: Street Pizza
summary: Located on the vibrant Thonglor streets, Street Pizza specializes in artisanal pizzas that promise a delightful experience. The classic margherita features sourdough fermented for 36 hours, creating a soft, fluffy crust complemented by a sweet tomato base and fresh basil. This spot is perfect for pizza lovers seeking quality in an emerging culinary area.

name: Sushi Kuuya
summary: Sushi Kuuya offers a fresh take on traditional sushi, making waves in the culinary scene of Bangkok. New and innovative dishes are crafted to delight every palate, perfect for food enthusiasts seeking unique flavors. This vibrant spot is not just about food; it's an experience that celebrates the art of sushi-making.

name: Take Eat Easy
summary: Take Eat Easy is a sustainable brunch spot that emphasizes local and organic ingredients, with eggs from their own farm and vegetables grown in-house. The menu features unique dishes like organic Turkish Eggs served with homemade yogurt and cheese. Enjoy a guilt-free meal while contributing to a lower carbon footprint.

name: Tapori
summary: Tapori redefines Indian cuisine with a curated selection from over 300 recipes, showcasing unique dishes like tawa-masala kaleji, a chicken liver ice cream on dosa crumble. The milky ice cream benami kheer is another must-try that invites diners to guess its secret ingredient. This innovative approach promises an unforgettable culinary experience for adventurous food lovers.

name: Tina's
summary: Tina's is a fresh addition to Bangkok's culinary scene, showcasing vibrant New Orleans cuisine alongside innovative ramen dishes and artisanal pizza. This spot promises to satisfy diverse palates with its eclectic menu, perfect for food enthusiasts. Experience the buzz of new flavors in a lively atmosphere that caters to every type of foodie.

name: Tokki
summary: Tokki offers a unique blend of Korean dining that sits between casual and fine dining. The menu features playful dishes like Corn Kimchi Jeon and Bulgogi Fries, complemented by traditional liquor pairings such as honey coconut makgeolli. With a minimalist decor full of indoor plants, it's an inviting space for lovers of Korean cuisine.

name: Unagi Yondaime Kikukawa
summary: Unagi Yondaime Kikukawa stands out with its focus on authentic ramen specialties, perfect for food enthusiasts. The restaurant is part of a vibrant wave of new eateries that have opened in 2024, catering to diverse tastes. Discover your next favorite dish in this exciting culinary landscape.

name: Leave a Comment
summary: Explore new culinary delights at the latest restaurants in town. Each spot offers unique dishes that promise to tantalize your taste buds. Discover your next favorite meal in an exciting atmosphere.

name: May Veggie Home
summary: This peaceful vegan haven on Ratchadaphisek Road has been delighting health-conscious diners since 2011. Specialties include regional dishes like plant-based panang curry and khao soi with tofu and mushrooms. A small selection of burgers and Japanese options also caters to diverse tastes.

name: Plantiful
summary: Plantiful, a pet-friendly cafe founded by a UCLA graduate, serves scientifically-backed dishes free from refined sugar and chemicals. The menu features unique offerings like spicy kimchi soba, catering to health-conscious diners. Open daily from 8 AM to 5 PM, it's a perfect spot for a nutritious meal in a cozy atmosphere.

name: Bonita Cafe and Social Club
summary: Bonita Cafe and Social Club serves as a welcoming hub for Bangkok's running community, promoting a healthy vegan lifestyle. The Studio Ghibli-inspired interiors provide a cozy atmosphere perfect for relaxation and connection with fellow health enthusiasts. Enjoy a variety of dishes, including their flavorful Japanese curry with brown rice.

name: Veganerie
summary: Veganerie transforms the vegan bakery experience into a full-fledged restaurant, offering modern-rustic decor and a diverse plant-based menu. Indulge in creative dishes like mushroom 'pulled pork' burgers and decadent desserts such as cashew cheesecakes. This beloved spot promises a delightful culinary journey for vegans and non-vegans alike.

name: Nourish Cafe
summary: Nourish Cafe is an ideal stop for those recovering from intense training at Bangkok Fight Lab. This plant-based spot serves energizing dishes made from fresh, whole ingredients, including a standout barbecue jackfruit burger. Enjoy a wholesome meal in a relaxed atmosphere that promotes healthy living.

name: Vistro
summary: A bright vegan bistro filled with greenery and natural light creates a refreshing atmosphere. Dishes like the kimchi-dilla showcase vibrant flavors that elevate plant-based dining. Open daily, Vistro invites guests to enjoy creative meals in a positive setting.

name: Pimp My Salad
summary: Pimp My Salad stands out in Sathorn for its generous portions and fresh ingredients. Acai bowls are a highlight, showcasing vibrant flavors and healthy options. Open daily from 8 am to 8 pm, this spot is perfect for a nutritious meal on the go.

name: Broccoli Revolution
summary: A vibrant plant-based haven in Thonglor, Broccoli Revolution serves up healthy delights like the broccoli-quinoa burger. The brick-walled ambiance creates a cozy and inviting atmosphere perfect for casual dining. Open daily from 10am to 10pm, this spot is a must-visit for those seeking nutritious options without sacrificing flavor.

name: Na Aroon
summary: Na Aroon offers a serene dining experience within the elegant confines of Ariyasom Villa hotel, featuring tall windows and dark teak accents. The restaurant specializes in vegetarian Thai cuisine, with a standout tom yum hed made from fresh mushrooms. Enjoy a peaceful meal in this charming setting, where seafood is the only non-vegetarian option.

name: Barefood
summary: Barefood offers a delightful range of vegan-friendly dishes, including plant-based burgers and fresh lasagna. This Ekkamai deli also features unique plant-based nut cheeses and organic rice bowls. Regular workshops on weekends add a creative touch to the dining experience.

name: Anotai
summary: Anotai offers a refined atmosphere for vegetarians, featuring expertly crafted dishes from fresh produce sourced directly from the chef's farm. The menu highlights Thai flavors with options like tamarind chili fried rice paired with salted egg, showcasing creativity in vegetarian cuisine. Open daily from 10 AM to 9 PM, this spot promises a delightful culinary experience.

name: Saras Veg
summary: Saras Veg captures the essence of a charming backstreet Indian diner with its colorful atmosphere and eclectic clientele. The extensive vegetarian menu offers beloved dishes like paneer dosa, all prepared with bold spices that excite the palate. Expect timely service in a cozy setting where every bite is delightfully indulgent.

name: Govinda
summary: A cozy haven for Italian cuisine enthusiasts, Govinda boasts a warm ambiance adorned with shelves of cookbooks. The all-vegetarian menu surprises with homemade cannelloni and other beloved dishes, showcasing creativity in Italian dining. Enjoy this unique experience any day of the week, with extended hours on weekends.

name: Suananda
summary: Suananda offers a serene escape with homemade vegetarian dishes in a tranquil garden setting. The Indian-inspired menu features seasonal organic ingredients, including charitable lunch sets that support those in need. Yoga and healthy cooking classes enhance the holistic experience of this hidden gem.

name: Saravana Bhavan
summary: A vibrant eatery, Saravana Bhavan proudly claims its title as the world's number one Indian vegetarian restaurant chain. Patrons can indulge in an extensive menu featuring authentic South Indian dishes like Mysore masala dosa and sambar vada. Open daily from 8 AM to 10:30 PM, it’s a must-visit for both locals and visitors craving flavorful vegetarian meals.

name: Hummus Boutique
summary: Hummus Boutique offers a delightful all-Mediterranean, all-vegetarian experience in a cozy setting adorned with warm woods and patterned tiles. The signature chickpea dip shines with an array of toppings, including the unique Chickpeas Brulee. Open daily from 11:30 am to 9:30 pm, it's a perfect spot for health-conscious diners seeking innovative flavors.

name: Baan Tepa
summary: Baan Tepa has transformed from a humble chef’s table into a vibrant urban farm and fine-dining restaurant, showcasing a unique zero-waste philosophy. The cozy setting combines vintage charm with modern decor, creating an inviting atmosphere for diners. Chef Chudaree “Tam” Debhakam's innovative menu highlights local produce, making this culinary experience truly exceptional.

name: Phed Mark
summary: Phed Mark offers a unique dining experience that captivates with its flavorful dishes and ambiance. The restaurant's unpretentious charm makes it a hidden gem worth exploring. A visit promises delightful culinary surprises in an inviting setting.

name: Inddee
summary: Inddee offers a unique fine dining experience in a century-old building, blending creative Indian cuisine with a stunning wine selection. The warm, modern design features an open kitchen and foggy jungle garden, setting the stage for a memorable meal. Guests can indulge in a seven-course tasting menu that highlights intricate flavors and expertly paired wines.

name: Hakata Tempura Nagaoka Ekkamai
summary: Hakata Tempura Nagaoka in Ekkamai offers a delightful twist on Japanese dining with its affordable yet high-quality tempura. The minimalist decor complements the culinary experience, where each dish is crafted with precision by chef Kazauki Shiroma. From shrimp to wagyu and even unique desserts, this spot promises a memorable meal without breaking the bank.

name: Kenny's
summary: Kenny's in the Ari area offers comfort food with a twist, inviting guests into its cozy two-floor space. The standout pizzas and beef burgers are complemented by an impressive craft beer selection, perfect for late-night cravings until 3am. Accessible from BTS Ari, this spot combines delicious flavors with a laid-back atmosphere that feels like home.

name: Quickie
summary: Quickie stands out in Bangkok for its vibrant and lively atmosphere, perfect for those seeking a fast yet flavorful dining experience. The diverse menu caters to various tastes, making it a popular destination for both locals and tourists alike. Open 24 hours, it's an ideal spot for anything from a quick lunch to a relaxed dinner.

name: Macha
summary: Tucked away in Thonglor, Macha offers a cozy escape with its Korean-inspired dishes and welcoming ambiance. The menu features playful twists on classics like jangjorim bibim-myon and addictive macha tteokbokki, all served in a charming three-storey setting. Expect a delightful blend of comfort food and intimate vibes that make it a must-visit for culinary enthusiasts.

name: Resonance
summary: Resonance offers a unique fine dining experience in Bangkok, blending Japanese influences with a seasonal 14-course tasting menu. The minimalist decor allows the exquisite dishes to shine, featuring ingredients like firefly squid and crab spring rolls that burst with flavor. Chef Shunsuke Shimomura's innovative creations invite curiosity and satisfaction, making every visit worthwhile.

name: Gaston
