summary: Sophistication meets modern flair at The Loft, where early-20th-century cocktails are expertly crafted. Marble and brass decor provide an elegant backdrop for enjoying stunning city views. Knowledgeable bartenders elevate your experience with unique off-menu options upon request.

name: The Bamboo Bar
summary: The Bamboo Bar at Mandarin Oriental offers a unique blend of tropical modernism and nightly live jazz, creating an inviting atmosphere. Its menu creatively incorporates Thai botanicals into classic cocktails, served in a timeless setting with rattan and teak decor. An enforced dress code and early arrivals are recommended to avoid the line at this evolving bucket-list destination.

name: Stella
summary: Stella offers an enchanting riverside lounge experience where exquisite garnish meets Asian botanicals. Each dish is a work of art, with stunning presentations and a theatrical service style that elevates every visit. Perfect for romantic evenings, the ambiance is enhanced by river reflections and a curated atmosphere.

name: Penthouse Bar + Grill
summary: Penthouse Bar + Grill offers a multi-level experience at Park Hyatt, seamlessly blending a cocktail bar, whisky room, and rooftop. The drink menu highlights spirit-forward creations with subtle smoke and sweetness, while the atmosphere shifts from intimate conversations to vibrant DJ sets. AvroKO's sophisticated design invites exploration and encourages dressing sharp for an unforgettable night out.

name: Havana Social
summary: Step into Havana Social, a captivating speakeasy that transports visitors to pre-revolution Cuba with its vintage decor and lively ambiance. Enjoy an impressive rum selection while dancing to salsa nights and live music, creating an unforgettable experience. Each visit feels like being part of a cinematic scene, complete with a cover charge on peak nights.

name: Crimson Room
summary: Step into the Crimson Room, a Gatsby-era cabaret adorned in red velvet that exudes big-band glamour. Champagne cocktails and floral sours accompany live performances in an intimate setting perfect for conversation. Reserve a booth near the stage for an immersive experience that invites dressing up and lingering between sets.

name: Find the Photo Booth
summary: Hidden behind a working photo booth, this speakeasy invites playful reveals in a compact, sharp design. The menu features clever and balanced drinks, including clarified milk punches and nostalgic cordials. Ideal for first dates and intimate gatherings, the atmosphere is both witty and engaging.

name: 008 Bar
summary: 008 Bar exudes a Prohibition-era charm with leather booths and dark woods, creating an intimate atmosphere. The head bartender's expertise shines through in the meticulously crafted cocktails, where minimalistic garnishes let the spirits speak for themselves. Jazz-infused playlists enhance the cocooned vibe, making it a perfect spot for a sophisticated night out.

name: Iron Balls Distillery & Bar
summary: Iron Balls Distillery & Bar offers a unique industrial-nautical ambiance with a working gin still at its heart. Enjoy house gin and tonics enhanced by kaffir-lime, all served in stunning glassware that complements the venue's design. As night falls, DJs create a low-simmer energy, perfect for unwinding with friends or enjoying a creative drink experience.

name: The Key Room No.72
summary: Discover The Key Room No.72, a hidden speakeasy tucked inside Josh Hotel's retro ambiance. Here, cocktail crafting is an art form, with every detail from dilution to glass temperature receiving meticulous care. An intimate setting invites personal interaction with bartenders, making for a memorable experience—reservations are recommended.

name: Electric Sheep (Talat Noi/Charoenkrung)
summary: Retro-futurist dining at Electric Sheep combines Mediterranean flair with Thai ingredients, creating a unique culinary experience. Guests can enjoy shareable plates and an impressive selection of wines and cocktails while taking in stunning views of the riverfront. Ideal for date nights or small gatherings, reservations are recommended for golden-hour seating.

name: Chenin (Sukhumvit 31/Phrom Phong)
summary: Chenin offers a unique blend of a natural-wine bar and a chef-driven small-plates kitchen, perfect for adventurous palates. The ambiance is cozy and intimate, with counter seating that encourages interaction among guests. Expect innovative dishes paired with rare wines in a casual-chic setting; reservations are recommended on weekends.

name: Charmgang Curry Shop (Talat Noi/Charoenkrung 35)
summary: Charmgang Curry Shop offers a vibrant twist on modern Thai curries in a compact, artfully designed space. With its Bib Gourmand recognition and a focus on bold flavors, this lively canteen is perfect for curry enthusiasts. Reservations are recommended as it fills up quickly due to its popularity.

name: Ojo (Silom/Mahanakhon 76F)
summary: Experience modern Mexican cuisine at Ojo, a stunning rooftop venue in Bangkok with sweeping skyline views. Chef Paco Ruano elevates traditional dishes in a chic, geometric setting, perfect for sunset cocktails and dinner. Reservations are recommended to secure prime seating in this stylish space.

name: Na-Oh (Bang Phlat/ChangChui)
summary: Experience a surreal tasting menu aboard a restored Lockheed TriStar aircraft, where creative courses meet theatrical design. Ideal for birthdays or visitors seeking something unique, this venue offers great value and stunning photo opportunities. Reserve window tables to enhance the dramatic dining experience.

name: Haoma (Phrom Phong/Sukhumvit 31)
summary: Haoma offers a unique neo-Indian tasting menu, emphasizing sustainability through its urban farm and circular kitchen ethos. The plant-filled dining room provides a tranquil setting for serious food enthusiasts to indulge in innovative dishes. Reservations are essential to secure a spot at this acclaimed culinary destination.

name: JHOL (Sukhumvit 18/Asok)
summary: JHOL offers a fresh take on coastal-Indian cuisine in a stylishly modern brasserie setting. The menu emphasizes seafood with nuanced spices, making it perfect for both group gatherings and intimate date nights. Reservations are recommended to enjoy this delightful dining experience.

name: 80/20 (Charoenkrung 26)
summary: Experience contemporary Thai cuisine in a sleek warehouse setting, where chef's-bar energy meets meticulous sourcing. Tasting menus invite culinary enthusiasts to indulge while enjoying a vibrant atmosphere. Counter seats offer an engaging view of the kitchen action, perfect for food lovers.

name: Villa Frantzén (Yen Akat/Sathorn)
summary: Experience a unique blend of Nordic and Asian cuisine in a serene villa setting, complete with a garden and open kitchen. The elegant bar and set-menu format offer a refined yet welcoming atmosphere, perfect for special occasions. Reservations are highly recommended for weekends due to its popularity.

name: Sühring (Yen Akat)
summary: Sühring offers an exquisite modern German dining experience within a luxurious, glass-lined villa. Each tasting menu showcases technique-driven plates inspired by childhood memories, perfect for special occasions. Though jackets are not required, dressing up enhances the elegant atmosphere.

name: Baan Tepa Culinary Space (Ramkhamhaeng/Hua Mak)
summary: Baan Tepa Culinary Space offers a unique dining experience with its garden-wrapped campus dedicated to modern Thai cuisine. The focus on biodiversity and terroir reflects a commitment to sustainable practices in an inviting setting of warm woods and contemporary design. Reservations are essential for this exclusive destination dining.

name: Côte by Mauro Colagreco (Riverside/Capella Bangkok)
summary: Côte by Mauro Colagreco offers a Riviera-inspired dining experience with exquisite menus and a polished wine selection. The serene, sun-drenched design enhances views of the Chao Phraya River, making it perfect for leisurely meals. Reservations are recommended to enjoy this smart casual gem.

name: IGNIV Bangkok (Ratchadamri/St. Regis)
summary: Experience fine dining at IGNIV Bangkok, where dishes crafted by Swiss chef Andreas Caminada are served in artistic tableware. The share-style format encourages variety, making it perfect for groups looking to indulge. Seasonal menus and a weekend brunch add freshness to an elegant atmosphere.

name: Mezzaluna (Riverside/Lebua 65F)
summary: Experience a unique blend of Japanese ingredients and French techniques at this sky-high tasting room. With stunning river views and a modern, elegant atmosphere, it's perfect for special occasions. Reservations are recommended for those seeking the best seats.

name: Aksorn (Charoenkrung/Central: The Original Store)
summary: Aksorn presents a refined dining experience that highlights mid-20th-century Thai recipes in a beautifully restored setting. The interior features elegant wood accents reminiscent of the 1950s, creating a charming atmosphere. Reservations are essential to enjoy their thoughtfully curated set menus.

name: Le Du (Silom)
summary: Chef Ton’s modern-Thai tasting menus highlight seasonal ingredients, artfully presented in a serene, low-lit setting. The atmosphere balances culinary sophistication with warmth, making it an ideal choice for special occasions. Reservations are recommended for the 4- or 6-course options to ensure a memorable dining experience.

name: Nusara (Old Town/Ta Tien)
summary: Nusara presents a vibrant twist on traditional Thai cuisine within an elegant townhouse atmosphere. Indulge in playful snacks and family-style dishes, all served in a beautifully designed space that harmonizes old Bangkok charm with modern sophistication. Reservations are essential due to limited seating and a smart dress code.

name: Gaggan Anand (Sukhumvit 31)
summary: Experience a groundbreaking culinary journey at Gaggan Anand, where over 20 courses of Indian-inspired cuisine are paired with music and performance. This sleek townhouse setting elevates dining into an immersive event, perfect for special occasions. Secure your reservation well in advance for this high-end tasting experience.

name: Restaurant POTONG (Yaowarat/Chinatown)
summary: Chef Pam invites diners on a progressive Thai-Chinese culinary journey in a beautifully restored herbal-medicine shophouse. The immersive experience is enhanced by dramatic lighting and a focus on the five elements and senses, making it perfect for romantic outings. Reservations are essential to enjoy this sharp-dressed dining adventure.

name: Sorn (Sukhumvit 26)
summary: Experience Southern-Thai cuisine at Sorn, where every dish is a masterpiece crafted with precision and rare ingredients. The moody townhouse setting enhances the choreography of service, ensuring a memorable dining experience. Reservations are essential, often requiring a month in advance due to its exclusivity.

name: Keller (Suan Phlu/Chan Kao Rd.)
summary: Chef Mirco Keller offers a creative fusion of Asian and European flavors in an intimate, sunlit setting. Monthly menu changes keep the experience fresh, making it ideal for couples seeking culinary adventure. Reservations are recommended to fully enjoy this unique tasting journey.

name: Sababa (Thonglor 13)
summary: Experience a unique fusion of Mediterranean and Japanese cuisine at Sababa, set in a vibrant terracotta-and-neon villa. Ideal for sharing plates, the lively atmosphere draws in a friendly neighborhood crowd, especially with its inviting garden space for alfresco dining. Arrive early to secure outdoor seating and enjoy walk-in options during weekdays.

name: Rangoon Tea House Bangkok (Soi Sangchai/Thonglor BTS)
summary: Rangoon Tea House brings a modern twist to Burmese cuisine in Bangkok, offering a stylish atmosphere with patterned floors and brass accents. Indulge in traditional dishes like mohinga and tea-leaf salads while enjoying a curated selection of teas and cocktails. This family-friendly spot is perfect for weekend brunch, but be sure to make a reservation as it can get busy.

name: Nobu Bangkok (Sathorn/Empire)
summary: Experience the luxury of Nobu Bangkok, where Japanese-Peruvian cuisine meets stunning city views from the rooftop. This elegant venue offers signature dishes amidst a sleek interior perfect for special occasions. Reservations are recommended to ensure an unforgettable dining experience.

name: Stage (Sathorn 9)
summary: Stage (Sathorn 9) offers a refined tasting experience with a focus on new French and global cuisine, showcasing local produce through an ever-evolving menu. The intimate setting features chic lighting and a selection of wines, complemented by a secret room for after-dinner drinks. For the ultimate experience, indulge in their meticulously crafted 8-course meal.

name: Sushi Masato
summary: Sushi Masato offers an intimate omakase experience, showcasing Chef Masato Shimizu's blend of Tokyo techniques and New York flair. The 10-seat counter emphasizes Edomae-style sushi with meticulous attention to detail in fish preparation and service. Reservations are essential for a truly personal dining journey featuring seasonal ingredients from Toyosu market.

name: Sushi Ichizu
summary: Sushi Ichizu offers a refined Edomae experience in an intimate setting, featuring pale hinoki wood and soft lighting. Each piece of nigiri is a testament to meticulous craftsmanship, emphasizing balance and the natural flavors of aged fish and seasonal shellfish. The atmosphere encourages quiet appreciation, making every visit a unique culinary journey.

name: Umi
summary: Umi stands out as a premier omakase destination, where each dish is crafted with precision and simplicity. The serene ambiance, characterized by contemporary design and natural materials, enhances the dining experience. Seasonal offerings like Hokkaido uni showcase the chef's commitment to quality and flavor.

name: Fillets
summary: Chef Randy Noprapa creates a unique dining experience at Fillets, blending kappo sensibility with premium sushi in an artfully designed space. The menu features impeccable nigiri, refined small plates, and charcoal-grilled skewers, perfect for food enthusiasts. Enjoy attentive service and a curated wine and sake list that elevates any date night.

name: Kitaohji Ginza
summary: Kitaohji Ginza offers a serene kaiseki dining experience focused on seasonal ingredients and meticulous presentation. The intimate setting, featuring private rooms and tatami details, transforms each meal into a calming ritual. Opt for the multi-course set and allow the attentive staff to guide your culinary journey.

name: Yamazato
summary: Yamazato offers an exquisite dining experience with formal kaiseki, tempura, and sushi in a tranquil setting. The seasonal menu showcases fresh ingredients while the attentive service enhances the meditative atmosphere. Ideal for those seeking a smartly dressed culinary adventure with thoughtful pairings of sake.

name: Kinu by Takagi
summary: Kinu by Takagi offers an intimate kaiseki experience with just ten seats, where each dish is a testament to culinary artistry. The serene atmosphere allows the delicate flavors and exquisite plating to shine, creating a truly immersive dining journey. Perfect for special occasions, this hidden gem invites guests to savor every moment.

name: Shirokane Tori-Tama
summary: Experience the artistry of yakitori at Shirokane Tori-Tama, where each skewer showcases beak-to-tail chicken grilled to perfection. The lively U-shaped counter allows diners to enjoy the sizzle and aroma while savoring expertly paired drinks like crisp beer or highballs. Let the knowledgeable staff guide your culinary journey through a menu that embodies izakaya craftsmanship.

name: JUA
summary: JUA is a vibrant yakitori and sake den set in a stylish converted shophouse, where contemporary art meets upbeat vibes. Enjoy expertly crafted skewers alongside imaginative small plates and refreshing yuzu cocktails. The energetic counter invites socializing, while the mezzanine offers an intimate setting for date nights.

name: Teppen
summary: Teppen offers a unique robatayaki dining experience where chefs skillfully fan flames while serving fresh seafood and wagyu on cedar planks. The lively atmosphere is perfect for small groups looking to enjoy energetic meals filled with smoky flavors. Be prepared for a joyful evening, but dress lightly as the charcoal will leave its mark.

name: Nobu Bangkok
summary: Nobu Bangkok offers a sophisticated dining experience with skyline views and a blend of Japanese-Peruvian cuisine. Signature dishes like yellowtail jalapeño and black cod are complemented by Thai-inspired specials and an extensive sake selection. The sleek design and vibrant atmosphere make it perfect for celebrations, especially when booked at a window table.

name: Tenko Omakase
summary: Tenko Omakase offers an intimate 10-seat counter experience, delivering premium omakase in a cedar-fragrant setting. Guests can savor seasonal neta and Toyosu flights, complemented by warm dishes that enhance comfort. The welcoming service caters to both first-timers and purists, making it a balanced culinary retreat.

name: Joushitsu Sushi
summary: Joushitsu Sushi offers a refined sushi experience with impeccable technique and attention to detail. The limited seating creates an intimate atmosphere, allowing diners to savor each course without feeling rushed. A reservation at the counter is essential for those seeking a true culinary journey.

name: Sushi Niwa
summary: Sushi Niwa offers a serene omakase experience with a focus on classic nigiri and thoughtful warm dishes like chawanmushi. The attentive chef shares insights into sourcing and preparation, making it welcoming for newcomers. Seasonal delicacies such as crab and uni elevate the meal in a polished yet human setting.

name: Honmono Sushi
summary: Honmono Sushi stands out in Bangkok for its refined approach to sushi and sashimi, offering a wide selection from otoro to ankimo. The ambiance caters to both families and solo diners, with comfortable seating at tables or the sushi counter. Strong value lunch sets make it a reliable choice for quality dining.

name: Jidori-ya Kenzo
summary: Jidori-ya Kenzo serves up expertly grilled yakitori, creating a cozy atmosphere filled with the enticing aroma of smoke. Quick and cheerful staff enhance the friendly vibe, making it an ideal spot for after-work relaxation. Enjoy a variety of small plates and refreshing cold beers in this neighborhood gem.

name: Mensho Tokyo
summary: Mensho Tokyo presents a unique ramen experience where silky tori paitan and expertly crafted chashu create bowls that resemble art. Noodles are perfectly paired with aromatic broth, resulting in a harmonious and transportive meal. Expect a fast turnover during lunch, making it ideal for solo diners seeking quality.

name: Kaneko Hannosuke
summary: Kaneko Hannosuke specializes in tempura tendon from Tokyo, featuring a remarkably light batter and a glaze that enhances the dish. Enjoy watching shrimp, anago, and vegetables being fried to perfection at the counter while savoring generous bowls of fluffy rice. The bright and functional space emphasizes the artistry of tempura, making each bite a crafted experience rather than just a meal.

name: Tempura Yamaya
summary: Tempura Yamaya specializes in feather-light tempura, expertly crafted with seasonal vegetables and seafood. Engaging counter seating immerses diners in the rhythm of frying and serving, creating a soothing atmosphere. Pair your meal with a refreshing beer or chilled sake for a delightful experience.

name: Tonkatsu Aoki
summary: Tonkatsu Aoki specializes in perfectly fried katsu, where each cutlet boasts a satisfying crunch and a juicy interior. Balanced accompaniments of cabbage, rice, and miso enhance the experience without overpowering the star of the show. The tranquil wooden decor sets an ideal backdrop for enjoying this master class in simplicity.

name: Gen Japanese
summary: Gen Japanese offers an intimate dining experience where kappo technique brings forth comforting and elegant dishes. The chef's meticulous presentation transforms each ingredient into a small lesson, set within a softly designed space that highlights the food. Sake pairings are carefully chosen to complement the delicate flavors, promising a gentle yet surprising evening.

name: Den Kushi Flori
summary: Den Kushi Flori redefines kushiyaki with a modern twist, offering vegetable skewers that receive the same culinary attention as meats. The chic, light-filled space is perfect for stylish groups looking to share small plates and sip refreshing drinks. Reservations are recommended for weekend visits to ensure a spot in this vibrant setting.

name: Ki Izakaya
summary: Ki Izakaya offers a refined izakaya experience with a menu designed for grazing, featuring kushiyaki and tempura. The warm wooden decor and private nooks create an inviting atmosphere perfect for socializing over Japanese cocktails. Ideal for both pre- and post-dinner gatherings, this spot elevates the casual dining scene in style.

name: YTSB – Yellow Tail Sushi Bar
summary: YTSB – Yellow Tail Sushi Bar provides an intimate sushi dining experience where the chef shares insights on fish provenance and preparation. Clean cuts and respectful seasoning enhance the delightful omakase journey, all within a cozy, dark atmosphere that highlights each dish. Perfect for both adventurous eaters and casual diners looking for friendly fine dining.

name: Zuma Bangkok
summary: Zuma Bangkok offers a vibrant izakaya experience with a focus on robata seafood and crisp tempura in an alluring, dimly lit setting. The lively atmosphere is enhanced by shared plates and a DJ-driven soundtrack, perfect for energetic gatherings. Ideal for brunch or evening outings, this venue invites guests to dress up and enjoy its tight sushi program alongside signature cocktails.

name: Tensui
summary: Nestled in a garden-framed house, Tensui offers a serene dining experience where kaiseki sensibility meets à la carte comfort. Enjoy expertly prepared soba, tempura, and sashimi while savoring the seasonal ingredients that take center stage. Ideal for families and couples seeking a classic yet tranquil atmosphere.

name: Ginzado
summary: Ginzado stands out as a premier yakiniku destination, specializing in exquisite cuts of wagyu in an elegant wood-and-leather setting. Expert staff ensure each cut is grilled to perfection, complemented by thoughtfully chosen sides like kimchi and salads. Ideal for indulgent group dining, this venue balances luxury with a controlled atmosphere.

name: Mizu by Sankyodai
summary: Mizu by Sankyodai offers a unique fusion of fish market and omakase experiences, where freshness takes center stage. Guests can delight in sashimi flights and hot dishes while engaging with knowledgeable staff about sourcing details. This bright venue is perfect for adventurous eaters eager to explore seasonal offerings.

name: Soi Aoyama
summary: Soi Aoyama brings a vibrant izakaya experience infused with Tokyo street energy. Enjoy a rotating selection of skewers, comfort bowls, and seasonal small plates in a lively yet cozy setting. Perfect for friends gathering late into the evening, this spot promises speedy service and cheerful vibes.

name: Uomura
summary: Uomura specializes in seafood, focusing on grilled fish, nimono, and sashimi that highlight quality ingredients. An understated dining room fosters a serene atmosphere, making it a favorite among chefs. A thoughtfully curated sake list complements the menu's offerings, particularly the fish collar and salt-grilled specialties.

name: Sushi Misaki
summary: Sushi Misaki offers an intimate omakase experience where hospitality and conversation are as vital as the culinary craft. The chef expertly guides diners through seasonal selections, focusing on texture and temperature. Ideal for a romantic first date, this softly lit venue emphasizes precision and tradition in its nigiri.

name: Akira Back
summary: Akira Back offers a vibrant dining experience with its Korean-Japanese fusion cuisine, set in a stunning curved-wood space that provides skyline views. The menu features bold rolls and well-presented sashimi, complemented by playful cocktails and an extensive sake selection. Ideal for groups seeking energy, brunch serves as a perfect introduction to this culinary delight.

name: Tenyuu Grand
summary: Tenyuu Grand offers a sophisticated dining experience with a variety of sushi counters and teppan tables, all within an elegant setting. The menu expertly combines luxury cuts and comfort staples, making it suitable for both families and business diners. Quick, courteous service complements sensible portion sizes, ensuring a versatile choice for group dining.

name: Sushi Siharu
summary: Sushi Siharu offers an intimate omakase experience, where a soft-spoken chef crafts seasonal vinegar blends for the rice. This serene space features thoughtfully selected ceramics and courses that transition from sashimi to warm dishes, culminating in a nigiri wave. Excellent sake pairings enhance the understated elegance of the meal, perfect for those seeking quality over spectacle.

name: Tempura Kuroda
summary: Tempura Kuroda transforms tempura into an art form, where each piece is served fresh with a delicate balance of salt and citrus. The intimate counter seating creates a focused experience, ideal for savoring seasonal vegetables and sweetfish when available. This minimalist gem promises precise pacing and a unique culinary journey.

name: Sushi Kanda
summary: Sushi Kanda offers an intimate omakase experience that feels like dining with family. Each dish is crafted with precision, featuring delicate cuts of fish and perfectly seasoned rice, occasionally complemented by a surprise warm dish. Reservations are essential due to the limited seating and high demand.

name: Yamazaki Teppanyaki
summary: Experience the art of teppanyaki at Yamazaki, where every meal is a captivating performance. High-quality proteins and thoughtfully prepared vegetables shine, all while the chef engages guests with charm. Ideal for small groups celebrating special occasions, especially during later seatings for added spectacle.

name: Ginza Sushi Ichi
summary: Ginza Sushi Ichi offers an exquisite omakase experience that adheres to Tokyo's high standards. The intimate counter setting emphasizes the artistry of sushi preparation with premium ingredients and attentive service. A reservation is essential for this luxurious treat-yourself destination.

name: Sushi Mori
summary: Sushi Mori offers a refined atmosphere for enjoying meticulously prepared sushi and sashimi. With its inviting sushi bar and attentive chefs, it’s perfect for lunch sets or intimate dinners. Modern yet comfortable interiors make this spot a solid choice in the area.

name: Sushi Hiro
summary: Sushi Hiro stands out in Bangkok with its exceptional quality sushi, from otoro to engawa, crafted with precise knife work. Bright and contemporary interiors create a family-friendly atmosphere, perfect for both lunch and dinner. Strong value sets during lunch and premium upgrades at dinner ensure consistency and swift service.

name: Sora City
summary: Sora City presents an upscale take on the Japanese food hall concept, showcasing sleek counters for ramen, sushi, grills, and sake. The stylish yet casual atmosphere makes it perfect for groups eager to sample diverse culinary delights. Enjoy the vibrant ambiance by sitting near the ramen or yakitori stations for an immersive experience of flavors and aromas.

name: Zingaro By Honmono
summary: Zingaro By Honmono offers a playful twist on traditional sushi with a relaxed izakaya vibe. Expect an array of chirashi, inventive rolls, and fresh fried dishes that are both fun and clean. Ideal for friends easing into sushi without the strict omakase experience, especially on weekends.

name: Uotora
summary: Uotora offers a cozy atmosphere where the art of sashimi and grilled fish is treated with utmost respect. Seasonal finds and deep cuts highlight a carefully curated menu, complemented by thoughtfully prepared rice, pickles, and soups. The warm lighting and attentive staff create an inviting experience that's quietly excellent.

name: Nagiya
summary: Nagiya buzzes with a vibrant izakaya atmosphere, serving up grilled meats, hearty stews, and fresh raw dishes that arrive quickly. The earthenware decor and handwritten menus evoke a lively Tokyo after-work scene, perfect for gathering friends. A solid selection of beer, highballs, and decent sake complements the energetic late-night vibe.

name: Sushi Cyu & Carnival Yakiniku
summary: Sushi Cyu & Carnival Yakiniku offers a unique dining experience where pristine sushi meets premium yakiniku in a thoughtfully designed space. Enjoy expertly grilled beef and fresh fish, perfect for mixed groups seeking variety. Attentive service enhances your culinary journey, making it a cozy spot to gather with friends.

name: MTCH (Ari)
summary: A contemporary matcha atelier offers a serene experience where single-origin Japanese powders are whisked to order. The minimalist design, featuring raw concrete and pale wood, creates a calm atmosphere ideal for design enthusiasts. Enjoy purist usucha and meticulously crafted milk drinks that highlight the unique terroir of each matcha cultivar.

name: Grow tea.studio (Sukhumvit 31)
summary: Experience matcha in a refined setting at Grow tea.studio, where each sip is treated as a lesson in taste memory. The soft Japandi design and warm lighting create an inviting atmosphere for unhurried enjoyment, complemented by expertly whisked matcha and seasonal treats. Engage with knowledgeable staff who guide you through the craft of matcha preparation.

name: Ksana Matcha (One City Centre, Phloen Chit)
summary: Ksana Matcha offers a tranquil escape within the bustling city, featuring curated ceremonial teas from Japan. The serene ambiance is enhanced by thoughtful wagashi pairings and elegant glassware, creating a modern tea ceremony experience. Ideal for late-morning relaxation or intimate dates, this sanctuary invites you to slow down and savor each sip.

name: CHAEN Tea Experience (Thonglor)
summary: Experience a unique tea journey at CHAEN, where guided tastings and workshops explore competition-grade matcha. The serene atmosphere, inspired by Japanese tearooms, enhances the educational experience of whisking and pouring techniques. It's a perfect blend of tradition and hospitality for tea lovers.

name: Yama Matcha (Chula Soi 5)
summary: Yama Matcha offers a refined experience centered around expertly whisked matcha and traditional wagashi pairings. The bright, light-wood interiors create an intimate atmosphere perfect for purists seeking to explore different flavor profiles. Seasonal specials and tasting flights elevate this gem in the Siam/Chula area.

name: Seven Suns Matcha (theCOMMONS Thonglor)
summary: Seven Suns Matcha offers a minimalist menu focused on pure matcha and soft-serve, showcasing expert technique in a functional design. Regulars return for the rotating selection of Japanese lots, making it a staple in Thonglor's café scene. A perfect stop for matcha enthusiasts exploring the area.

name: Tealily Café (Ekkamai)
summary: Tealily Café in Ekkamai offers a serene atmosphere perfect for enjoying matcha in a refined setting. The wood-toned interior invites soft conversation, making it ideal for leisurely afternoons. Desserts complement the tea without overwhelming its delicate flavors.

name: Koto Tea Space (Phrom Phong area)
summary: Intimate Japanese tea sessions unfold in a crafted, low-distraction space that emphasizes clarity and ceremonial service. The boutique tea bar features focused seating and a simple counter, allowing staff to guide guests through various grades and serving styles. With a vibe more akin to a salon than a café, it's perfect for first encounters.

name: Peace Oriental Teahouse (Ekkamai flagship)
summary: Peace Oriental Teahouse is a serene haven for Japanese tea enthusiasts, featuring design-led spaces and a focus on ceremonial matcha. Staff expertly guide guests through the nuances of whisking and tasting, creating a mindful experience. This teahouse offers a calm refuge ideal for focused tea sessions.

name: HOME.matcha (Suan Luang/Rama IX)
summary: HOME.matcha serves as a cozy retreat for matcha lovers, focusing on purity and craftsmanship in a welcoming residential ambiance. Each drink is expertly whisked, complemented by seasonal petits fours that elevate the experience. Limited operating hours and a short menu ensure exclusivity, making every visit feel special.

name: Katsute Matcha (Sathorn)
summary: Katsute Matcha offers a serene escape in the bustling Sathorn area, featuring a minimalist design that invites relaxation. The menu highlights premium matcha drinks and traditional wagashi, curated to suit your mood. Experience a gentle pause with expertly crafted beverages in this neighborhood gem.

name: A. Matcha House (Bang Na)
summary: A. Matcha House in Bang Na blends the art of tea with a serene atmosphere, featuring hand-whisked matcha drinks and light sweets that enhance the experience. Bright walls and open shelving create a welcoming space for both tea enthusiasts and casual visitors alike. This venue offers a unique matcha ritual away from the hustle of the city core.

name: Chaho Café (Bang Rak/Sathorn fringe)
summary: Chaho Café offers a serene escape with its Japanese tea-first philosophy, featuring delightful matcha pastries and lattes. The softly lit interior highlights the aromatic experience, making it perfect for a relaxing afternoon break. Thoughtful milk alternatives enhance the clear matcha, ensuring each sip is memorable.

name: Experiment Café (Samyan)
summary: Experiment Café in Samyan redefines matcha with a design-driven approach that highlights seasonal creativity. Its clear and latte formats blend with playful specials, making each visit an engaging experience. The café's glass walls enhance the aesthetic, showcasing the craft without chaos, perfect for newcomers to ceremonial service.

name: SO! MATCHA (T-One, Sukhumvit 40)
summary: SO! MATCHA offers a sleek, lobby-bar ambiance with a focus on Shizuoka-inspired matcha options. Quick service meets meticulous preparation, ensuring each drink respects traditional sift-and-whisk techniques. Perfect for those seeking a flavorful yet convenient grab-and-go experience without compromising quality.

name: HOMU ほむ (Sathorn)
summary: HOMU ほむ offers a serene Japanese café experience, showcasing the delicate pairing of wagashi and matcha. The warm, wood-rich ambiance is complemented by soft music and a courteous pace, making it an ideal place to unwind. Enjoy mellow milk drinks that highlight the essence of premium tea in a cozy setting.

name: Qraft by Peace Oriental (Ari)
summary: Qraft by Peace Oriental offers a serene escape focused on ceremonial matcha and artisanal pastries. The elegant salon atmosphere, characterized by timber and soft lighting, elevates even the simplest orders. This refined venue is perfect for those seeking an exquisite pairing of craft pastry with quality matcha.

name: Wabi Cha (Pathum Wan/Siam area)
summary: Wabi Cha offers a serene escape with its zen-like ambiance and a focus on classic matcha preparations. The minimal seating emphasizes the bar experience, making it ideal for quick yet mindful breaks. Clear guidance on matcha intensity and temperature ensures a personalized experience for newcomers.

name: Sanji Matcha Bar (Bang Na BTS)
summary: Sanji Matcha Bar offers a serene micro-bar experience with a minimalist aesthetic, perfect for matcha enthusiasts. The menu features straight matcha, lattes, and seasonal specials alongside delicate warabi mochi or light cakes. Designed for commuters, this spot invites a quick yet thoughtful tea ceremony.

name: Kurasu Bangkok (Sukhumvit 57 area)
summary: Kurasu Bangkok offers a refined coffee experience with a focus on high-quality matcha from Kyoto. The minimalist design complements the precision of their brewing methods, making it an educational stop for tea enthusiasts. Taste the difference between whisked leaf and milk versions for a full flavor comparison.

name: Seven Suns (CentralWorld kiosk)
summary: Seven Suns at CentralWorld brings the essence of Thonglor to a bustling mall, focusing on matcha and soft-serve. Clean lines and minimal packaging enhance the experience of quality amidst the city's rush. Perfect for those seeking a quick yet refined treat without straying from their path.

name: Good Chā (Thonglor 13 – compact bar)
summary: Good Chā offers a grab-and-go experience while maintaining a focus on high-quality matcha. The compact bar features an efficient design with a clear menu and seasonal specials that keep customers intrigued. Perfectly positioned in Thonglor, it serves as an ideal pit stop for café crawls.

name: Grow tea.studio (Sutthisan original)
summary: Grow tea.studio invites matcha enthusiasts into a serene, studio-like space that fosters an intimate vibe. Patrons can savor the delicate balance of bitterness and umami, guided by attentive staff through unique cold-whisk formats. This quiet haven is perfect for those seeking precision in every sip without heaviness.

name: Peace Oriental Teahouse (Langsuan)
summary: Experience a serene retreat at Peace Oriental Teahouse, where zen aesthetics and ritualistic tea ceremonies create a tranquil atmosphere. The elegant pairing of mochi and light wagashi enhances the tasting experience, making it perfect for a refined pause. Located near Lumpini, this teahouse offers a unique blend of tradition and calm in the heart of the city.

name: Ksana Matcha (CentralWorld kiosk)
summary: Ksana Matcha at CentralWorld offers a serene escape for matcha lovers, showcasing both ceremonial and premium grades. The minimalist design complements the efficient yet gentle service, creating an inviting atmosphere to pause between shopping errands. Enjoy a thoughtful sampling of matcha in this tranquil mall-side kiosk.

name: AVANTCHA Tea Bar (Thonglor)
summary: AVANTCHA Tea Bar in Thonglor presents a refined atmosphere where matcha and an extensive tea selection take center stage. Designed for relaxation, the space features quiet corners and a retail wall for take-home kits. Experience ceremonial tea service that emphasizes quality and pacing, ideal for intimate gatherings or thoughtful meetups.

name: Studio Lam
summary: Studio Lam is a vibrant hub for lovers of molam and global grooves, offering a unique blend of Thai roots and diverse musical influences. The venue features a carefully curated lineup of DJs and live acts, creating an atmosphere where discovery is key. Signature cocktails and ya dong infusions enhance the experience, making it a must-visit for those seeking an authentic slice of Bangkok nightlife.

name: Bar Marco
summary: Bar Marco, a cozy listening bar in Thonglor, immerses guests in a warm atmosphere filled with vinyl records and curated music from soul to modern funk. Classic cocktails with thoughtful twists complement the intimate setting, making it perfect for both dates and deep music nights. The respectful volume and high-fidelity sound create a personal experience that keeps regulars coming back.

name: The Label Club
summary: Nestled off Silom, The Label Club offers a refined atmosphere focused on music and quality drinks. With a rotating lineup of DJs spinning neo-soul and deep house, the bar fosters an attentive crowd eager to appreciate the sound. Expect a clean, minimal design paired with crafted cocktails and an inviting vibe perfect for music lovers.

name: Freaking Out The Neighborhood
summary: Freaking Out The Neighborhood is a cozy listening bar that celebrates sound over spectacle, featuring eclectic sets that range from soulful jazz to low-slung disco. Classic cocktails and playful signatures create a welcoming atmosphere for conversation among music lovers. Weekends transform into vibrant scene reunions, where the focus remains on clarity and connection through music.

name: Long Play Music & Bar (Josh Hotel)
summary: Long Play Music & Bar offers a nostalgic vibe with its vinyl-lined walls and a carefully curated sound system. A mix of hotel guests and locals enjoy laid-back evenings filled with soul, jazz, and soft rock while sipping refreshing drinks. This photogenic space invites you to unwind and embrace Bangkok's vibrant listening-bar culture.

name: Vinyl & Wine BKK (EM District)
summary: Vinyl & Wine BKK merges a record lounge with a wine cellar, offering a unique experience in the EM District. Guests can enjoy carefully selected LPs alongside curated by-the-glass wines and mixed drinks while relaxing in a cozy atmosphere. With conversation-friendly sound and attentive staff, it’s the perfect spot for vinyl enthusiasts and casual visitors alike.

name: CCC Listening Bar
summary: CCC Listening Bar immerses guests in a rich audio experience, focusing on hi-fi sound with an eclectic mix of jazz-funk and disco. Bartenders serve simple yet crisp drinks, allowing the music to take center stage in a cozy atmosphere. The vibe encourages conversation while maintaining a dedicated listening environment, perfect for audiophiles and casual visitors alike.

name: Lennon’s (Rosewood Bangkok)
summary: Lennon’s at Rosewood Bangkok offers an enchanting experience with its impressive 6,000-record library and mid-century glamour. Enjoy a curated selection of music, from jazz to soft rock, alongside expertly crafted cocktails that pay homage to musical legends. This luxurious lounge is perfect for a romantic date or a unique outing for audiophiles seeking a memorable skyline view.

name: Alonetogether
summary: Alonetogether offers a sophisticated blend of live jazz and vinyl listening in an elegant setting. Enjoy expertly crafted cocktails while seasoned musicians breathe new life into classic standards, all within a cozy environment that allows for meaningful conversation. This refined hideaway is perfect for those who appreciate both exceptional sound quality and musicianship.

name: Culture Cafe
summary: Culture Cafe serves as a vibrant hub for Bangkok’s vinyl enthusiasts, blending intimate music experiences with a curated drink menu. Evenings unfold with jazz and soul, transitioning to disco and house, creating an inviting atmosphere for conversation and connection. Expect to leave inspired with new music discoveries amidst a welcoming crowd.

name: Entertainment Project
summary: Entertainment Project on Charoenkrung offers a unique fusion of a gallery-like bar and an audiophile room designed for deep listening. With a focus on adventurous selectors blending jazz, dub, ambient, and house, the atmosphere encourages respectful exploration of sound. Minimalist drinks complement the experience, ensuring that the music takes center stage in this curated auditory journey.

name: Smalls
summary: Smalls offers a cozy atmosphere with three floors of charm, perfect for enjoying live jazz and DJ sets. The cocktail menu features classic drinks alongside off-menu surprises, making it a local favorite. Expect nights that evolve into spontaneous dance sessions, all while maintaining a laid-back vibe.

name: The Bamboo Bar (Mandarin Oriental)
summary: The Bamboo Bar at the Mandarin Oriental offers an elegant blend of world-class cocktails and live jazz every night. With its timeless decor and polished service, this venue provides a quintessential Bangkok experience for music lovers. Reservations are recommended, especially on weekends when guest vocalists elevate the atmosphere.

name: Saxophone Pub
summary: Saxophone Pub near Victory Monument has been a beloved venue for live jazz, blues, and soul music for decades. With two nightly sets from talented bands, the atmosphere is vibrant and welcoming to both locals and visitors. The old-school decor and smooth service enhance the experience of enjoying high-energy performances every night of the week.

name: Brown Sugar: The Jazz Boutique
summary: Brown Sugar: The Jazz Boutique has been a beloved jazz bar in Bangkok for four decades, offering a blend of café warmth and club energy. Live music fills the space with intimate early sets transitioning to lively performances later in the evening. A casual atmosphere draws a mixed crowd, including local musicians, making it a perfect spot for enjoying authentic tunes and straightforward drinks.

name: Foojohn Jazz Club
summary: Foojohn Jazz Club offers an intimate setting perfect for jazz enthusiasts, showcasing unique line-ups in a cozy, dimly lit room. The friendly staff and well-curated performances create a community vibe where every visit feels fresh. Enjoy expertly crafted cocktails and wines while immersing yourself in Bangkok's vibrant jazz scene.

name: Groovin’ High Jazz Bar & Café
summary: Groovin’ High Jazz Bar & Café in Silom offers an intimate setting for jazz lovers, featuring live music from duos to trios every night. With a focus on musicianship and a welcoming atmosphere, it's perfect for those looking to unwind with quality performances. Enjoy drinks and light bites as you soak in the rich sounds of real instruments up close.

name: Abandoned Mansion
summary: Abandoned Mansion offers an enchanting speakeasy experience just steps from Asok BTS, blending 1930s gangster glam with live jazz. Plush booths and a small stage create an intimate atmosphere, perfect for dates or small celebrations. The friendly staff and exceptional performances ensure guests stay captivated well into the night.

name: The Rock Pub
summary: A haven for rock enthusiasts, The Rock Pub has been a staple of Bangkok's live music scene since the late 1980s. Intimate performances range from classic rock to metal, all enjoyed at reasonable volumes. Fair prices and a devoted crowd make this bar perfect for those who appreciate guitar-driven tunes.

name: Maggie Choo’s
summary: Maggie Choo’s offers a captivating blend of live jazz and late-night DJ sets in an atmospheric Shanghai-noir bar. The eclectic crowd enjoys theatrical decor while sipping on a diverse drinks menu, ensuring a vibrant night out. Experience the transition from soulful crooners to energetic DJs as the evening unfolds.

name: Bar 335
summary: Bar 335 is a cozy hideout in Phrom Phong that embodies the essence of Japanese neighborhood bars. With soulful DJs spinning records and classic cocktails, it sets the perfect atmosphere for easy conversation. This stylish venue invites return visits as the night deepens and the music evolves.

name: Tina’s Sathorn
summary: Tina’s Sathorn seamlessly blends contemporary New Orleans cuisine with a vibrant jazz scene in a refined Suan Phlu setting. Live music on Friday nights and Sunday brunch creates an inviting atmosphere, complemented by classic cocktails. The polished yet relaxed service caters to both diners and music enthusiasts, making it perfect for those seeking a full meal with their tunes.

name: Speakerbox
summary: Speakerbox transforms from a chill café during the day to a vibrant live music hub at night, showcasing indie, funk, and jazz acts. With a dedicated stage and excellent sound quality, it offers an intimate setting for music lovers. Expect an ever-changing lineup of both local talents and touring bands in a community-focused atmosphere.

name: Adhere the 13th Blues Bar
summary: Adhere the 13th Blues Bar offers an intimate setting for live blues, with performances just steps away from your table. Decorated with musical memorabilia, this cozy venue welcomes both locals and visitors to enjoy heartfelt music. Affordable drinks and friendly staff enhance the overall experience in this beloved old-town staple.

name: aftersun Listening Bar
summary: Located in Bang Bon, aftersun Listening Bar offers a vintage ambiance with its 1970s décor and a serene atmosphere perfect for unwinding. Patrons can enjoy mellow soul, soft rock, jazz, and city pop while sipping simple yet refreshing drinks, ideal for extended conversations. A corner dedicated to collectible vinyl highlights the bar's commitment to music enthusiasts.

name: Marshall Livehouse Bangkok
summary: Marshall Livehouse Bangkok offers an intimate riverside experience with a focus on live music. Backed by the renowned amplifier brand, this venue features quality sound and lighting for an immersive atmosphere. Enjoy crafted cocktails and a diverse lineup from local acts to special showcases that enrich the city's music scene.

name: Brownstone Studio
summary: Brownstone Studio in On Nut is a vibrant hub for indie music, hosting everything from shoegaze to jazz. Audiences mingle with bands, creating a communal atmosphere that fosters discovery of new talent. With fair prices and an inviting patio, it's a must-visit for live music enthusiasts.

name: Buddha & Pals
summary: Buddha & Pals offers a cozy vintage café vibe with live jazz performances that create an intimate atmosphere. Classic cocktails and comfort food complement the warm, attentive service, making it perfect for both dinner and music lovers. The charming 80-year-old building enhances the romantic experience without being overly sentimental.

name: The Key Room No.72 (Josh Hotel)
summary: Tucked away behind a hidden door, The Key Room No.72 at Josh Hotel offers a cozy cocktail experience with a focus on soulful grooves and mellow vibes. Plush seating creates an intimate atmosphere perfect for dates or relaxed conversations, complemented by a drinks menu featuring spirit-forward classics. Enjoy polished cocktails while the smooth soundtrack enhances your evening in this unique bar setting.

name: Sugar Ray: You’ve Just Been Poisoned
summary: Sugar Ray offers an intimate cocktail experience inspired by Japanese listening bars, where low lighting and curated soundtracks create a refined atmosphere. Enjoy expertly crafted drinks that match the mood of soulful jazz, city pop, and 70s funk without the distraction of mainstream hits. This hidden gem attracts a discerning crowd seeking both quality cocktails and a thoughtful music selection.

name: Rough & Round
summary: Rough & Round offers a serene coffee experience in Yaowarat, where minimalist design meets premium single-origin brews. This architect-led sanctuary invites coffee enthusiasts to engage in slow mornings and thoughtful conversations. Expect a calm ambiance that encourages appreciation for the art of coffee-making.

name: Two Hands Coffee
summary: Two Hands Coffee in Silom offers a serene atmosphere perfect for solo work or intimate conversations. The specialty bar emphasizes meticulous espresso and clean, fruit-forward pour-overs, showcasing the craft of its skilled baristas. With a minimalist design featuring concrete and pale wood, it creates a refined space that highlights the quality of the drinks.

name: My Paws Backyard
summary: My Paws Backyard offers a unique blend of eco-café and community garden, serving specialty coffee in a pet-friendly setting. The atmosphere is enhanced by solar panels and no-plastic practices, creating an inviting space for both relaxation and work. Weekend mornings attract families and dog owners, while weekdays provide a serene environment for quiet sessions.

name: VIVIN Suk 22
summary: VIVIN Suk 22 combines a chic market ambiance with artisan offerings, spotlighting Thai charcuterie and local cheeses. The deli-style counter invites patrons to enjoy curated boards and tartines alongside thoughtfully selected wines. Ideal for daytime grazing or picking up edible souvenirs, this café is a must-visit for food enthusiasts.

name: Aimée Petit Bistro
summary: Aimée Petit Bistro offers a slice of Montmartre in Bangkok's north, creating an intimate ambiance perfect for romantic evenings. The menu showcases comforting French classics, expertly plated in a cozy setting adorned with brass and banquettes. Ideal for those seeking a quiet escape from the bustling city center.

name: The Greenhouse
summary: The Greenhouse offers a fresh take on Cantonese-Thai comfort food in a polished yet inviting setting. Signature dishes like silky congee with abalone and wok-tossed noodles cater to any meal, day or night. Perfect for late-night cravings and family gatherings, this vibrant dining hall welcomes all.

name: Pastaio
summary: Pastaio delivers a vibrant atmosphere with freshly made pasta and a neighborhood pizzeria vibe in The Quad’s stylish hall. An open kitchen and warm brick oven enhance the experience, showcasing classic dishes alongside creative specials. Ideal for casual dining with friends before a night out.

name: Cupping Coffee & Baker
summary: Cupping Coffee & Baker offers a bright, design-focused café experience within The Quad. Precision espresso and pastries like shokupan French toast create a perfect mid-shop pick-me-up. Mornings are mellow while afternoons bring a lively buzz.

name: Meathead
summary: Meathead serves up a playful take on classic Americana with its retro burger and sandwich bar. Enjoy expertly crafted patties and cheeky shakes in a lively atmosphere, perfect for grabbing a quick bite before the game. The combination of Thai flavors and traditional comfort food makes it a unique dining experience.

name: CuCu Bar & Terrace
summary: CuCu Bar & Terrace offers a relaxed cocktail experience with highballs and spritzes served amidst an urban backdrop. The soft industrial decor and outdoor seating create an inviting atmosphere, perfect for walk-ins and hotel guests. Visit at dusk to enjoy the refreshing breeze and city lights in a smart casual setting.

name: 1872 Lounge Bar
summary: 1872 Lounge Bar boasts a serene atmosphere highlighted by Japanese-inspired design and plush seating, perfect for intimate gatherings. The cocktail and whiskey menu features both classic recipes and rare pours, all served with attentive hospitality. Ideal for quiet business meetings or a relaxing nightcap, the bar seats are highly sought after.

name: Sesui
summary: Experience disciplined Edomae techniques at Aman’s omakase counter, where the focus is on market-fresh fish and perfectly seasoned rice. In a hushed, timber-lined room, diners enjoy a ritual of mindful pacing without any distractions. Limited seating ensures an intimate atmosphere, making advance booking essential.

name: Mil Social Club
summary: Mil Social Club in Thonglor offers an inviting atmosphere with a mid-century design, perfect for enjoying live music. The lounge features seating tiers and velvet drapes that enhance the performance experience while serving expertly crafted cocktails. Ideal for date nights or small gatherings, arriving early ensures prime seating options.

name: Groove 55
summary: Groove 55 channels the charm of a retro jazz club, featuring polished wood and brass accents. A lively venue with stage-forward acoustics offers a small plates menu ideal for late-night music lovers. Dress to impress and call ahead for weekend performances.

name: Weekend Thonglor
summary: Weekend Thonglor offers an intimate stage for indie bands, featuring a creative crowd and raw aesthetic. Highballs and easy sours complement the vibrant atmosphere during discovery nights. Expect standing room only as local talent takes the spotlight.

name: Colorama
summary: Colorama offers a vibrant dining experience with its focus on vegetable-forward dishes in a lively pop-art setting. The open kitchen and dining bar create an engaging atmosphere where plating is part of the show. Ideal for light lunches, it pairs perfectly with coffee from the adjacent Sauce.

name: Bianca
summary: Bianca offers a contemporary Italian dining experience with a stylish atmosphere and an impressive wine selection. The menu emphasizes seasonal produce, making it perfect for both business lunches and romantic dinners. Reservations are recommended during peak hours to enjoy this design-district gem.

name: Mitsukoshi Depachika
summary: Mitsukoshi Depachika showcases Thailand's first depachika with exquisite kiosks and regional delicacies in a beautifully designed space. Explore a variety of bento, confectionery, and specialty pour-over coffee from curated stalls. Visit during weekday afternoons for a more relaxed experience away from the crowds.

name: Rough & Round Roastery Lab
summary: Rough & Round Roastery Lab offers coffee lovers a unique opportunity to engage in small-batch roasting and cupping within a studio-like environment. Interactive sessions encourage participants to explore brewing variables and deepen their coffee knowledge. Keep an eye on their socials for upcoming cupping events, and come prepared with your questions.

name: Kayy Coffee
summary: Kayy Coffee offers a visually stunning experience with its Instagram-ready decor and expertly crafted matcha and espresso drinks. Ideal for a refreshing break from the heat of old town, this café ensures that quality extraction is always on point. Enjoy playful beverages in a tidy setting perfect for mid-day cool-downs.

name: Homey Coffee
summary: Nestled by the canal near the Reclining Buddha, Homey Coffee offers a serene escape with its neutral tones and gentle playlists. Enjoy balanced coffee and a selection of pastries in a friendly atmosphere, perfect for unwinding after temple visits. Mornings here are particularly tranquil, inviting leisurely conversations over cups of coffee.

name: Milin
summary: Milin offers a cozy escape in Ari, showcasing modern Thai cuisine with an emphasis on regional flavors and seasonal ingredients. The warm, terracotta decor creates an intimate atmosphere perfect for date nights. Reservations are recommended for weekends, with prices in the approachable $$$ range.

name: Khwan Jai
summary: Khwan Jai presents a modern twist on Isaan cuisine, focusing on charcoal grilling in a stylish timber-steel environment. The menu showcases house ferments and local greens, ideal for sharing with friends or family. Signature offerings like grilled chicken, laab, and sticky rice promise to enhance your dining experience.

name: Shed Bakery
summary: Shed Bakery offers a delightful fusion of traditional Viennoiserie techniques and playful Thai flavors. Exquisite laminated doughs and seasonal fruits grace the patisserie counter, all set in a stylish sandy palette with brass accents. Arrive early to secure your morning treats, as they tend to sell out quickly.

name: Room 55
summary: Room 55 is a cocktail den that prioritizes an immersive listening experience with its vinyl-focused sound system. The ambiance features low lighting and mid-century chairs, perfect for enjoying clarified cocktails and seasonal infusions. Ideal for those seeking a moody, intimate setting with hush-level service.

name: Field Note
summary: Field Note offers a unique slow-coffee experience in Bangkok's lush green lung, inviting guests to savor hand-brewed coffee like an art form. The wooden deck and shaded canopy create a tranquil setting perfect for long sips and leisurely breaks, especially after a bike ride. Limited seating enhances its charm, making it ideal for early weekend visits.

name: Dopamine Deli
summary: Dopamine Deli is a vibrant sandwich lab that blends nostalgic Y2K aesthetics with classic culinary techniques. Enjoy bold flavors from serious cold cuts and house pickles, perfect for a quick lunch or lively evenings with craft sodas and low-ABV cocktails. This spot promises a unique dining experience that stands out in Bangkok's food scene.

name: Saint Rita
summary: Saint Rita offers a modern Roman trattoria experience, illuminated by golden hour lighting reflecting off terracotta and travertine. Enjoy crafted dishes like cacio e pepe and seasonal fritti, complemented by a carefully curated Italian wine list. Smart-casual attire is encouraged, making it perfect for sharing plates and lingering over conversation.

name: Oxblood
summary: Oxblood captivates with its live-fire cooking, where local meats and vegetables are seared to perfection under a stunning vaulted brick ceiling. The dramatic ambiance is complemented by expertly crafted cocktails that lean towards stirred and short. A visit promises a unique dining experience centered around smoke, fat, and flame.

name: Midori Room
summary: Midori Room offers a serene tea-led experience that combines the art of Japanese matcha with exquisite patisserie. The elegant setting features moss-green decor and tatami hints, creating a quiet atmosphere for learning about matcha grades and temperatures. Reservations are recommended on weekends to ensure a spot in this unique culinary salon.

name: Playa
summary: A vibrant seafood bar with a Latin twist awaits just off the river walk, featuring fresh crudos and ceviches. Bright cocktails complement the breezy atmosphere, making this a perfect spot for golden hour. Opt for terrace seating to fully enjoy the scenic views and relaxed vibe.

name: Loam
summary: Loam showcases a unique, vegetable-forward approach with an inviting ceramics-studio ambiance. Seasonal Thai ingredients take center stage, complemented by carefully selected proteins and subtle fermentation techniques. Enjoy a value-driven lunch tasting or a reflective dinner experience in this thoughtfully designed space.

name: Studio 12
summary: Studio 12 offers an exquisite dessert experience in a minimalist setting, where plated sweets are crafted with precision. Monthly tasting flights present a harmonious balance of texture and temperature, elevating each bite to an art form. Reserve a counter seat for an intimate view of the finishing touches on these culinary creations.

name: Silica
summary: Silica stands out as a futuristic cocktail lab where innovation meets mixology. The bar features unique presentations of Thai botanicals in clarified, carbonated, and smoked formats, appealing to cocktail enthusiasts. With limited seating and a focus on quality, reservations are recommended for an unforgettable experience.

name: House of Rice
summary: House of Rice offers a cozy ambiance with a focus on Thai-Japanese comfort food, featuring dishes like donburi and ochazuke. Ingredients are thoughtfully sourced, ensuring that each bowl is crafted to highlight the best flavors of the season. This neatly styled spot is perfect for affordable, homestyle dining.
